00001 c====================================================================================
00002 c
00003 c
00004 C      SUBROUTINE T04_s(IOPT,PARMOD,PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
00005       SUBROUTINE T04S(IOPT,PARMOD,PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
00006 c
00007 c     ASSEMBLED:  MARCH 25, 2004; UPDATED:  AUGUST 2 & 31, DECEMBER 27, 2004.
00008 C
00009 c--------------------------------------------------------------------
00010 C   A DATA-BASED MODEL OF THE EXTERNAL (I.E., WITHOUT EARTH'S CONTRIBUTION) PART OF THE
00011 C   MAGNETOSPHERIC MAGNETIC FIELD, CALIBRATED BY
00012 C    (1) SOLAR WIND PRESSURE PDYN (NANOPASCALS),
00013 C    (2) DST (NANOTESLA),
00014 C    (3) BYIMF,
00015 C    (4) BZIMF (NANOTESLA)
00016 C    (5-10)   INDICES W1 - W6, CALCULATED AS TIME INTEGRALS FROM THE BEGINNING OF A STORM
00017 c               SEE THE REFERENCE (3) BELOW, FOR A DETAILED DEFINITION OF THOSE VARIABLES
00018 C
00019 c   THE ABOVE 10 INPUT PARAMETERS SHOULD BE PLACED IN THE ELEMENTS
00020 c   OF THE ARRAY PARMOD(10).
00021 C
00022 C   THE REST OF THE INPUT VARIABLES ARE: THE GEODIPOLE TILT ANGLE PS (RADIANS),
00023 C        X,Y,Z -  GSM POSITION (RE)
00024 C
00025 c   IOPT IS A DUMMY INPUT PARAMETER, INCLUDED TO MAKE THIS SUBROUTINE
00026 C   COMPATIBLE WITH THE TRACING SOFTWARE PACKAGE (GEOPACK). IN THIS MODEL,
00027 C   THE PARAMETER IOPT DOES NOT AFFECT THE OUTPUT FIELD.
00028 c
00029 C*******************************************************************************************
00030 c** ATTENTION:  THE MODEL IS BASED ON DATA TAKEN SUNWARD FROM X=-15Re, AND HENCE BECOMES   *
00031 C**              INVALID AT LARGER TAILWARD DISTANCES !!!                                  *
00032 C*******************************************************************************************
00033 C
00034 c   OUTPUT:  GSM COMPONENTS OF THE EXTERNAL MAGNETIC FIELD (BX,BY,BZ, nanotesla)
00035 C            COMPUTED AS A SUM OF CONTRIBUTIONS FROM PRINCIPAL FIELD SOURCES
00036 C
00037 c  (C) Copr. 2004, Nikolai A. Tsyganenko, USRA/Code 695.1, NASA GSFC
00038 c      Greenbelt, MD 20771, USA
00039 c
00040 C                            REFERENCES:
00041 C
00042 C  (1)   N. A. Tsyganenko, A new data-based model of the near magnetosphere magnetic field:
00043 c       1. Mathematical structure.
00044 c       2. Parameterization and fitting to observations.  JGR v. 107(A8), 1176/1179, doi:10.1029/2001JA000219/220, 2002.
00045 c
00046 c  (2)  N. A. Tsyganenko, H. J. Singer, J. C. Kasper, Storm-time distortion of the
00047 c           inner magnetosphere: How severe can it get ?  JGR v. 108(A5), 1209, doi:10.1029/2002JA009808, 2003.
00048 
00049 c   (3)  N. A. Tsyganenko and M. I. Sitnov, Modeling the dynamics of the inner
00050 c           magnetosphere during strong geomagnetic storms,  JGR v. 110, 2005, in press.
00051 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 c
00053       IMPLICIT  REAL*8  (A - H, O - Z)
00054       REAL*8 PARMOD(10),PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ
00055       REAL*8 A(69),PDYN,DST_AST,BXIMF,BYIMF,BZIMF,W1,W2,W3,W4,W5,W6,
00056      *  PSS,XX,YY,ZZ,BXCF,BYCF,BZCF,BXT1,BYT1,BZT1,BXT2,BYT2,BZT2,
00057      *  BXSRC,BYSRC,BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,BZPRC, BXR11,BYR11,BZR11,
00058      *  BXR12,BYR12,BZR12,BXR21,BYR21,BZR21,BXR22,BYR22,BZR22,HXIMF,
00059      *  HYIMF,HZIMF,BBX,BBY,BBZ
00060 C
00061       DATA A/1.00000D0,5.19884D0,0.923524D0,8.68111D0,0.00000D0,
00062      *-6.44922D0,11.3109D0, -3.84555D0,0.00000D0,0.558081D0,
00063      *0.937044D0,0.00000D0,0.772433D0,0.687241D0, 0.00000D0,
00064      *0.320369D0,1.22531D0,-0.432246D-01,-0.382436D0,0.457468D0, 
00065      *0.741917D0,0.227194D0,0.154269D0,5.75196D0,22.3113D0,
00066      *10.3526D0,64.3312D0, 1.01977D0,-0.200859D-01,0.971643D0,
00067      *0.295525D-01,1.01032D0,0.215561D0, 1.50059D0,0.730898D-01,
00068      *1.93625D0,1.74545D0,1.29533D0,0.714744D0,0.391687D0, 
00069      *3.31283D0,75.0127D0,6.36283D0,4.43561D0,0.387801D0,
00070      *0.699661D0,0.305352D-01, 0.581002D0,1.14671D0,0.876060D0,
00071      *0.386060D0,0.801831D0,0.874315D0,0.463634D0, 0.175077D0,
00072      *0.673053D0,0.388341D0,2.32074D0,1.32373D0,0.419800D0,
00073      *1.24968D0, 1.28903D0,.409286D0,1.57622D0,.690036D0,
00074      *1.28836D0,2.4054D0,.528557D0,.564247D0/
00075 
00076 C    original single prec.
00077 C      DATA A/1.00000,5.19884,0.923524,8.68111,0.00000,-6.44922,11.3109,
00078 C     * -3.84555,0.00000,0.558081,0.937044,0.00000,0.772433,0.687241,
00079 C     * 0.00000,0.320369,1.22531,-0.432246E-01,-0.382436,0.457468,
00080 C     * 0.741917,0.227194,0.154269,5.75196,22.3113,10.3526,64.3312,
00081 C     * 1.01977,-0.200859E-01,0.971643,0.295525E-01,1.01032,0.215561,
00082 C     * 1.50059,0.730898E-01,1.93625,1.74545,1.29533,0.714744,0.391687,
00083 C     * 3.31283,75.0127,6.36283,4.43561,0.387801,0.699661,0.305352E-01,
00084 C     * 0.581002,1.14671,0.876060,0.386060,0.801831,0.874315,0.463634,
00085 C     * 0.175077,0.673053,0.388341,2.32074,1.32373,0.419800,1.24968,
00086 C     * 1.28903,.409286,1.57622,.690036,1.28836,2.4054,.528557,.564247/
00087 
00088       DATA IOPGEN,IOPTT,IOPB,IOPR/0,0,0,0/
00089 C
00090       PDYN=PARMOD(1)
00091       DST_AST=PARMOD(2)*0.8-13.*SQRT(PDYN)
00092       BYIMF=PARMOD(3)
00093       BZIMF=PARMOD(4)
00094 C
00095       W1=PARMOD (5)
00096       W2=PARMOD (6)
00097       W3=PARMOD (7)
00098       W4=PARMOD (8)
00099       W5=PARMOD (9)
00100       W6=PARMOD(10)
00101 
00102       PSS=PS
00103       XX=X
00104       YY=Y
00105       ZZ=Z
00106 C
00107       CALL EXTERN (IOPGEN,IOPTT,IOPB,IOPR,A,79,PDYN,DST_AST,BXIMF,BYIMF,
00108      + BZIMF,W1,W2,W3,W4,W5,W6,PSS,XX,YY,ZZ,BXCF,BYCF,BZCF,BXT1,BYT1,
00109      + BZT1,BXT2,BYT2,BZT2,BXSRC,BYSRC,BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,BZPRC, BXR11,
00110      + BYR11,BZR11,BXR12,BYR12,BZR12,BXR21,BYR21,BZR21,BXR22,BYR22,
00111      + BZR22,HXIMF,HYIMF,HZIMF,BBX,BBY,BBZ)
00112 
00113 C
00114       BX=BBX
00115       BY=BBY
00116       BZ=BBZ
00117 C
00118       RETURN
00119       END
00120 
00121 c%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00122 c
00123       SUBROUTINE EXTERN (IOPGEN,IOPT,IOPB,IOPR,A,NTOT,
00124      *  PDYN,DST,BXIMF,BYIMF,BZIMF,W1,W2,W3,W4,W5,W6,PS,X,Y,Z,
00125      *  BXCF,BYCF,BZCF,BXT1,BYT1,BZT1,BXT2,BYT2,BZT2,
00126      *  BXSRC,BYSRC,BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,BZPRC, BXR11,BYR11,BZR11,
00127      *  BXR12,BYR12,BZR12,BXR21,BYR21,BZR21,BXR22,BYR22,BZR22,HXIMF,
00128      *  HYIMF,HZIMF,BX,BY,BZ)
00129 C
00130 C   IOPGEN - GENERAL OPTION FLAG:  IOPGEN=0 - CALCULATE TOTAL FIELD
00131 C                                  IOPGEN=1 - DIPOLE SHIELDING ONLY
00132 C                                  IOPGEN=2 - TAIL FIELD ONLY
00133 C                                  IOPGEN=3 - BIRKELAND FIELD ONLY
00134 C                                  IOPGEN=4 - RING CURRENT FIELD ONLY
00135 C                                  IOPGEN=5 - INTERCONNECTION FIELD ONLY
00136 C
00137 C   IOPT -  TAIL FIELD FLAG:       IOPT=0  -  BOTH MODES
00138 C                                  IOPT=1  -  MODE 1 ONLY
00139 C                                  IOPT=2  -  MODE 2 ONLY
00140 C
00141 C   IOPB -  BIRKELAND FIELD FLAG:  IOPB=0  -  ALL 4 TERMS
00142 C                                  IOPB=1  -  REGION 1, MODES 1 AND 2
00143 C                                  IOPB=2  -  REGION 2, MODES 1 AND 2
00144 C
00145 C   IOPR -  RING CURRENT FLAG:     IOPR=0  -  BOTH SRC AND PRC
00146 C                                  IOPR=1  -  SRC ONLY
00147 C                                  IOPR=2  -  PRC ONLY
00148 C
00149       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
00150 C
00151       DIMENSION A(NTOT)
00152 C
00153       COMMON /TAIL/ DXSHIFT1,DXSHIFT2,D,DELTADY  ! THE COMMON BLOCKS FORWARD NONLINEAR PARAMETERS
00154       COMMON /BIRKPAR/ XKAPPA1,XKAPPA2
00155       COMMON /RCPAR/ SC_SY,SC_AS,PHI
00156       COMMON /G/ G
00157       COMMON /RH0/ RH0
00158 C
00159 C
00160       DATA A0_A,A0_S0,A0_X0 /34.586D0,1.1960D0,3.4397D0/   !   SHUE ET AL. PARAMETERS
00161       DATA DSIG /0.005D0/, RH0,RH2 /7.5D0,-5.2D0/
00162 c
00163       XAPPA=(PDYN/2.)**A(23)   !  OVERALL SCALING PARAMETER
00164       RH0=7.5                  !  TAIL HINGING DISTANCE
00165 c
00166       G=  35.0                 !  TAIL WARPING PARAMETER
00167 
00168       XAPPA3=XAPPA**3
00169 
00170       XX=X*XAPPA
00171       YY=Y*XAPPA
00172       ZZ=Z*XAPPA
00173 C
00174       SPS=DSIN(PS)
00175 c
00176       X0=A0_X0/XAPPA
00177       AM=A0_A/XAPPA
00178       S0=A0_S0
00179 c
00180 C  CALCULATE "IMF" COMPONENTS OUTSIDE THE MAGNETOPAUSE LAYER (HENCE BEGIN WITH "O")
00181 C  THEY ARE NEEDED ONLY IF THE POINT (X,Y,Z) IS WITHIN THE TRANSITION MAGNETOPAUSE LAYER
00182 C  OR OUTSIDE THE MAGNETOSPHERE:
00183 C
00184       FACTIMF=A(20)
00185 c
00186       OIMFX=0.D0
00187       OIMFY=BYIMF*FACTIMF
00188       OIMFZ=BZIMF*FACTIMF
00189 c
00190       R=DSQRT(X**2+Y**2+Z**2)
00191       XSS=X
00192       ZSS=Z
00193 
00194   1   XSOLD=XSS      !   BEGIN ITERATIVE SEARCH OF UNWARPED COORDS (TO FIND SIGMA)
00195       ZSOLD=ZSS
00196 
00197       RH=RH0+RH2*(ZSS/R)**2
00198       SINPSAS=SPS/(1.D0+(R/RH)**3)**0.33333333D0
00199       COSPSAS=DSQRT(1.D0-SINPSAS**2)
00200       ZSS=X*SINPSAS+Z*COSPSAS
00201       XSS=X*COSPSAS-Z*SINPSAS
00202       DD=DABS(XSS-XSOLD)+DABS(ZSS-ZSOLD)
00203       IF (DD.GT.1.D-6) GOTO 1
00204 C                                END OF ITERATIVE SEARCH
00205       RHO2=Y**2+ZSS**2
00206       ASQ=AM**2
00207       XMXM=AM+XSS-X0
00208       IF (XMXM.LT.0.) XMXM=0. ! THE BOUNDARY IS A CYLINDER TAILWARD OF X=X0-AM
00209       AXX0=XMXM**2
00210       ARO=ASQ+RHO2
00211       SIGMA=DSQRT((ARO+AXX0+SQRT((ARO+AXX0)**2-4.*ASQ*AXX0))/(2.*ASQ))
00212 C
00213 C   NOW, THERE ARE THREE POSSIBLE CASES:
00214 C    (1) INSIDE THE MAGNETOSPHERE   (SIGMA
00215 C    (2) IN THE BOUNDARY LAYER
00216 C    (3) OUTSIDE THE MAGNETOSPHERE AND B.LAYER
00217 C       FIRST OF ALL, CONSIDER THE CASES (1) AND (2):
00218 C
00219 C+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00220       IF (SIGMA.LT.S0+DSIG) THEN  !  CASES (1) OR (2); CALCULATE THE MODEL FIELD
00221 C                                   (WITH THE POTENTIAL "PENETRATED" INTERCONNECTION FIELD):
00222 C+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00223 C
00224       IF (IOPGEN.LE.1) THEN
00225          CALL SHLCAR3X3(XX,YY,ZZ,PS,CFX,CFY,CFZ)         !  DIPOLE SHIELDING FIELD
00226          BXCF=CFX*XAPPA3
00227          BYCF=CFY*XAPPA3
00228          BZCF=CFZ*XAPPA3
00229       ELSE
00230          BXCF=0.D0
00231          BYCF=0.D0
00232          BZCF=0.D0
00233       ENDIF                                              !  DONE
00234 
00235       IF (IOPGEN.EQ.0.OR.IOPGEN.EQ.2) THEN
00236           DSTT=-20.
00237           IF (DST.LT.DSTT) DSTT=DST
00238           ZNAM=DABS(DSTT)**0.37
00239          DXSHIFT1=A(24)-A(25)/ZNAM
00240          DXSHIFT2=A(26)-A(27)/ZNAM
00241          D=A(36)*DEXP(-W1/A(37))  +A(69)
00242          DELTADY=4.7
00243 
00244          CALL DEFORMED (IOPT,PS,XX,YY,ZZ,                !  TAIL FIELD (THREE MODES)
00245      *    BXT1,BYT1,BZT1,BXT2,BYT2,BZT2)
00246       ELSE
00247          BXT1=0.D0
00248          BYT1=0.D0
00249          BZT1=0.D0
00250          BXT2=0.D0
00251          BYT2=0.D0
00252          BZT2=0.D0
00253       ENDIF
00254 
00255       IF (IOPGEN.EQ.0.OR.IOPGEN.EQ.3) THEN
00256 
00257           ZNAM=DABS(DST)
00258           IF (DST.GE.-20.D0) ZNAM=20.D0
00259           XKAPPA1=A(32)*(ZNAM/20.D0)**A(33)
00260           XKAPPA2=A(34)*(ZNAM/20.D0)**A(35)
00261 
00262          CALL BIRK_TOT (IOPB,PS,XX,YY,ZZ,BXR11,BYR11,BZR11,BXR12,BYR12,
00263      *   BZR12,BXR21,BYR21,BZR21,BXR22,BYR22,BZR22)    !   BIRKELAND FIELD (TWO MODES FOR R1 AND TWO MODES FOR R2)
00264       ELSE
00265          BXR11=0.D0
00266          BYR11=0.D0
00267          BZR11=0.D0
00268          BXR21=0.D0
00269          BYR21=0.D0
00270          BZR21=0.D0
00271       ENDIF
00272 
00273       IF (IOPGEN.EQ.0.OR.IOPGEN.EQ.4) THEN
00274          PHI=A(38)
00275 
00276           ZNAM=DABS(DST)
00277           IF (DST.GE.-20.D0) ZNAM=20.D0
00278           SC_SY=A(28)*(20.D0/ZNAM)**A(29) *XAPPA    !
00279           SC_AS=A(30)*(20.D0/ZNAM)**A(31) *XAPPA    !  MULTIPLICATION  BY XAPPA IS MADE IN ORDER TO MAKE THE SRC AND PRC
00280                                                     !     SCALING COMPLETELY INDEPENDENT OF THE GENERAL SCALING DUE TO THE
00281 C                                                         MAGNETOPAUSE COMPRESSION/EXPANSION                             !
00282 C
00283          CALL FULL_RC(IOPR,PS,XX,YY,ZZ,BXSRC,BYSRC,BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,
00284      *                                        BZPRC)  !  SHIELDED RING CURRENT (SRC AND PRC)
00285       ELSE
00286          BXSRC=0.D0
00287          BYSRC=0.D0
00288          BZSRC=0.D0
00289          BXPRC=0.D0
00290          BYPRC=0.D0
00291          BZPRC=0.D0
00292       ENDIF
00293 C
00294       IF (IOPGEN.EQ.0.OR.IOPGEN.EQ.5) THEN
00295          HXIMF=0.D0
00296          HYIMF=BYIMF
00297          HZIMF=BZIMF   ! THESE ARE COMPONENTS OF THE PENETRATED FIELD PER UNIT OF THE PENETRATION COEFFICIENT.
00298 C                             IN OTHER WORDS, THESE ARE DERIVATIVES OF THE PENETRATION FIELD COMPONENTS WITH RESPECT
00299 C                             TO THE PENETRATION COEFFICIENT.   WE ASSUME THAT ONLY TRANSVERSE COMPONENT OF THE
00300 C                             FIELD PENETRATES INSIDE.
00301        ELSE
00302          HXIMF=0.D0
00303          HYIMF=0.D0
00304          HZIMF=0.D0
00305        ENDIF
00306 C
00307 C-----------------------------------------------------------
00308 C
00309 C    NOW, ADD UP ALL THE COMPONENTS:
00310 c
00311       DLP1=(PDYN/2.D0)**A(21)
00312       DLP2=(PDYN/2.D0)**A(22)
00313 
00314       TAMP1=A(2)+A(3)*DLP1+A(4)*A(39)*W1/DSQRT(W1**2+A(39)**2)+A(5)*DST
00315       TAMP2=A(6)+A(7)*DLP2+A(8)*A(40)*W2/DSQRT(W2**2+A(40)**2)+A(9)*DST
00316       A_SRC=A(10)+A(11)*A(41)*W3/DSQRT(W3**2+A(41)**2)
00317      *  +A(12)*DST
00318       A_PRC=A(13)+A(14)*A(42)*W4/DSQRT(W4**2+A(42)**2)
00319      *  +A(15)*DST
00320       A_R11=A(16)+A(17)*A(43)*W5/DSQRT(W5**2+A(43)**2)
00321       A_R21=A(18)+A(19)*A(44)*W6/DSQRT(W6**2+A(44)**2)
00322 
00323       BBX=A(1)*BXCF+TAMP1*BXT1+TAMP2*BXT2+A_SRC*BXSRC+A_PRC*BXPRC
00324      * +A_R11*BXR11+A_R21*BXR21+A(20)*HXIMF
00325 
00326       BBY=A(1)*BYCF+TAMP1*BYT1+TAMP2*BYT2+A_SRC*BYSRC+A_PRC*BYPRC
00327      * +A_R11*BYR11+A_R21*BYR21+A(20)*HYIMF
00328 
00329       BBZ=A(1)*BZCF+TAMP1*BZT1+TAMP2*BZT2+A_SRC*BZSRC+A_PRC*BZPRC
00330      * +A_R11*BZR11+A_R21*BZR21+A(20)*HZIMF
00331 C
00332 C   AND WE HAVE THE TOTAL EXTERNAL FIELD.
00333 C
00334 C
00335 C  NOW, LET US CHECK WHETHER WE HAVE THE CASE (1). IF YES - ALL DONE:
00336 C
00337       IF (SIGMA.LT.S0-DSIG) THEN    !  (X,Y,Z) IS INSIDE THE MAGNETOSPHERE
00338 
00339        BX=BBX
00340        BY=BBY
00341        BZ=BBZ
00342                      ELSE           !  THIS IS THE MOST COMPLEX CASE: WE ARE INSIDE
00343 C                                             THE INTERPOLATION REGION
00344        FINT=0.5*(1.-(SIGMA-S0)/DSIG)
00345        FEXT=0.5*(1.+(SIGMA-S0)/DSIG)
00346 C
00347        CALL DIPOLE (PS,X,Y,Z,QX,QY,QZ)
00348        BX=(BBX+QX)*FINT+OIMFX*FEXT -QX
00349        BY=(BBY+QY)*FINT+OIMFY*FEXT -QY
00350        BZ=(BBZ+QZ)*FINT+OIMFZ*FEXT -QZ
00351 c
00352         ENDIF  !   THE CASES (1) AND (2) ARE EXHAUSTED; THE ONLY REMAINING
00353 C                      POSSIBILITY IS NOW THE CASE (3):
00354 C++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00355         ELSE
00356                 CALL DIPOLE (PS,X,Y,Z,QX,QY,QZ)
00357                 BX=OIMFX-QX
00358                 BY=OIMFY-QY
00359                 BZ=OIMFZ-QZ
00360         ENDIF
00361 C
00362       END
00363 c
00364 
00365 C$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
00366 C
00367          SUBROUTINE  SHLCAR3X3(X,Y,Z,PS,BX,BY,BZ)
00368 C
00369 C   THIS S/R RETURNS THE SHIELDING FIELD FOR THE EARTH'S DIPOLE,
00370 C   REPRESENTED BY  2x3x3=18 "CARTESIAN" HARMONICS, tilted with respect
00371 C   to the z=0 plane
00372 C
00373 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
00374 C  The 36 coefficients enter in pairs in the amplitudes of the "cartesian"
00375 c    harmonics (A(1)-A(36).
00376 c  The 14 nonlinear parameters (A(37)-A(50) are the scales Pi,Ri,Qi,and Si
00377 C   entering the arguments of exponents, sines, and cosines in each of the
00378 C   18 "Cartesian" harmonics  PLUS TWO TILT ANGLES FOR THE CARTESIAN HARMONICS
00379 C       (ONE FOR THE PSI=0 MODE AND ANOTHER FOR THE PSI=90 MODE)
00380 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
00381 C
00382       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
00383 C
00384       DIMENSION A(50)
00385       DATA A/-901.2327248D0,895.8011176D0,817.6208321D0,-845.5880889D0,
00386      *-83.73539535D0,86.58542841D0,336.8781402D0,-329.3619944D0,
00387      *-311.2947120D0, 308.6011161D0,31.94469304D0,-31.30824526D0,
00388      *125.8739681D0,-372.3384278D0, -235.4720434D0,286.7594095D0,
00389      *21.86305585D0,-27.42344605D0,-150.4874688D0, 2.669338538D0,
00390      *1.395023949D0,-.5540427503D0,-56.85224007D0,3.681827033D0, 
00391      *-43.48705106D0,5.103131905D0,1.073551279D0,-.6673083508D0,
00392      *12.21404266D0, 4.177465543D0,5.799964188D0,-.3977802319D0,
00393      *-1.044652977D0,.5703560010D0, 3.536082962D0,-3.222069852D0,
00394      *9.620648151D0,6.082014949D0,27.75216226D0, 12.44199571D0,
00395      *5.122226936D0,6.982039615D0,20.12149582D0,6.150973118D0, 
00396      *4.663639687D0,15.73319647D0,2.303504968D0,5.840511214D0,
00397      *.8385953499D-01, .3477844929D0/

00399 C original single prec
00400 C      DATA A/-901.2327248,895.8011176,817.6208321,-845.5880889,
00401 C     *-83.73539535,86.58542841,336.8781402,-329.3619944,-311.2947120,
00402 C     *308.6011161,31.94469304,-31.30824526,125.8739681,-372.3384278,
00403 C     *-235.4720434,286.7594095,21.86305585,-27.42344605,-150.4874688,
00404 C     *2.669338538,1.395023949,-.5540427503,-56.85224007,3.681827033,
00405 C     *-43.48705106,5.103131905,1.073551279,-.6673083508,12.21404266,
00406 C     *4.177465543,5.799964188,-.3977802319,-1.044652977,.5703560010,
00407 C     *3.536082962,-3.222069852,9.620648151,6.082014949,27.75216226,
00408 C     *12.44199571,5.122226936,6.982039615,20.12149582,6.150973118,
00409 C     *4.663639687,15.73319647,2.303504968,5.840511214,.8385953499E-01,
00410 C     *.3477844929/
00411 C
00412          P1=A(37)
00413          P2=A(38)
00414          P3=A(39)
00415          R1=A(40)
00416          R2=A(41)
00417          R3=A(42)
00418          Q1=A(43)
00419          Q2=A(44)
00420          Q3=A(45)
00421          S1=A(46)
00422          S2=A(47)
00423          S3=A(48)
00424 
00425          T1  =A(49)
00426          T2  =A(50)
00427 C
00428          CPS=DCOS(PS)
00429          SPS=DSIN(PS)
00430          S2PS=2.D0*CPS
00431 
00432 C
00433            ST1=DSIN(PS*T1)
00434            CT1=DCOS(PS*T1)
00435            ST2=DSIN(PS*T2)
00436            CT2=DCOS(PS*T2)
00437 
00438             X1=X*CT1-Z*ST1
00439             Z1=X*ST1+Z*CT1
00440             X2=X*CT2-Z*ST2
00441             Z2=X*ST2+Z*CT2
00442 C
00443 C
00444 c  MAKE THE TERMS IN THE 1ST SUM ("PERPENDICULAR" SYMMETRY):
00445 C
00446 C       I=1
00447 C
00448         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P1**2+1.D0/R1**2)
00449         CYP = DCOS(Y/P1)
00450         SYP = DSIN(Y/P1)
00451         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R1)
00452         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R1)
00453         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00454         FX1 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00455         HY1 = EXPR/P1*SYP*SZR
00456         FZ1 =-EXPR*CYP/R1*CZR
00457         HX1 = FX1*CT1+FZ1*ST1
00458         HZ1 =-FX1*ST1+FZ1*CT1
00459 
00460         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P1**2+1.D0/R2**2)
00461         CYP = DCOS(Y/P1)
00462         SYP = DSIN(Y/P1)
00463         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R2)
00464         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R2)
00465         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00466         FX2 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00467         HY2 = EXPR/P1*SYP*SZR
00468         FZ2 =-EXPR*CYP/R2*CZR
00469         HX2 = FX2*CT1+FZ2*ST1
00470         HZ2 =-FX2*ST1+FZ2*CT1
00471 
00472         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P1**2+1.D0/R3**2)
00473         CYP = DCOS(Y/P1)
00474         SYP = DSIN(Y/P1)
00475         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R3)
00476         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R3)
00477         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00478         FX3 =-EXPR*CYP*(SQPR*Z1*CZR+SZR/R3*(X1+1.D0/SQPR))
00479         HY3 = EXPR/P1*SYP*(Z1*CZR+X1/R3*SZR/SQPR)
00480         FZ3 =-EXPR*CYP*(CZR*(1.D0+X1/R3**2/SQPR)-Z1/R3*SZR)
00481         HX3 = FX3*CT1+FZ3*ST1
00482         HZ3 =-FX3*ST1+FZ3*CT1
00483 C
00484 C       I=2:
00485 C
00486         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P2**2+1.D0/R1**2)
00487         CYP = DCOS(Y/P2)
00488         SYP = DSIN(Y/P2)
00489         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R1)
00490         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R1)
00491         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00492         FX4 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00493         HY4 = EXPR/P2*SYP*SZR
00494         FZ4 =-EXPR*CYP/R1*CZR
00495         HX4 = FX4*CT1+FZ4*ST1
00496         HZ4 =-FX4*ST1+FZ4*CT1
00497 
00498         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P2**2+1.D0/R2**2)
00499         CYP = DCOS(Y/P2)
00500         SYP = DSIN(Y/P2)
00501         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R2)
00502         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R2)
00503         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00504         FX5 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00505         HY5 = EXPR/P2*SYP*SZR
00506         FZ5 =-EXPR*CYP/R2*CZR
00507         HX5 = FX5*CT1+FZ5*ST1
00508         HZ5 =-FX5*ST1+FZ5*CT1
00509 
00510         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P2**2+1.D0/R3**2)
00511         CYP = DCOS(Y/P2)
00512         SYP = DSIN(Y/P2)
00513         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R3)
00514         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R3)
00515         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00516         FX6 =-EXPR*CYP*(SQPR*Z1*CZR+SZR/R3*(X1+1.D0/SQPR))
00517         HY6 = EXPR/P2*SYP*(Z1*CZR+X1/R3*SZR/SQPR)
00518         FZ6 =-EXPR*CYP*(CZR*(1.D0+X1/R3**2/SQPR)-Z1/R3*SZR)
00519         HX6 = FX6*CT1+FZ6*ST1
00520         HZ6 =-FX6*ST1+FZ6*CT1
00521 C
00522 C       I=3:
00523 C
00524         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P3**2+1.D0/R1**2)
00525         CYP = DCOS(Y/P3)
00526         SYP = DSIN(Y/P3)
00527         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R1)
00528         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R1)
00529         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00530         FX7 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00531         HY7 = EXPR/P3*SYP*SZR
00532         FZ7 =-EXPR*CYP/R1*CZR
00533         HX7 = FX7*CT1+FZ7*ST1
00534         HZ7 =-FX7*ST1+FZ7*CT1
00535

00537         CYP = DCOS(Y/P3)
00538         SYP = DSIN(Y/P3)
00539         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R2)
00540         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R2)
00541         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00542         FX8 =-SQPR*EXPR*CYP*SZR
00543         HY8 = EXPR/P3*SYP*SZR
00544         FZ8 =-EXPR*CYP/R2*CZR
00545         HX8 = FX8*CT1+FZ8*ST1
00546         HZ8 =-FX8*ST1+FZ8*CT1
00547 
00548         SQPR= DSQRT(1.D0/P3**2+1.D0/R3**2)
00549         CYP = DCOS(Y/P3)
00550         SYP = DSIN(Y/P3)
00551         CZR = DCOS(Z1/R3)
00552         SZR = DSIN(Z1/R3)
00553         EXPR= DEXP(SQPR*X1)
00554         FX9 =-EXPR*CYP*(SQPR*Z1*CZR+SZR/R3*(X1+1.D0/SQPR))
00555         HY9 = EXPR/P3*SYP*(Z1*CZR+X1/R3*SZR/SQPR)
00556         FZ9 =-EXPR*CYP*(CZR*(1.D0+X1/R3**2/SQPR)-Z1/R3*SZR)
00557         HX9 = FX9*CT1+FZ9*ST1
00558         HZ9 =-FX9*ST1+FZ9*CT1
00559 
00560 
00561        A1=A(1)+A(2)*CPS
00562        A2=A(3)+A(4)*CPS
00563        A3=A(5)+A(6)*CPS
00564        A4=A(7)+A(8)*CPS
00565        A5=A(9)+A(10)*CPS
00566        A6=A(11)+A(12)*CPS
00567        A7=A(13)+A(14)*CPS
00568        A8=A(15)+A(16)*CPS
00569        A9=A(17)+A(18)*CPS
00570        BX=A1*HX1+A2*HX2+A3*HX3+A4*HX4+A5*HX5+A6*HX6+A7*HX7+A8*HX8+A9*HX9
00571        BY=A1*HY1+A2*HY2+A3*HY3+A4*HY4+A5*HY5+A6*HY6+A7*HY7+A8*HY8+A9*HY9
00572        BZ=A1*HZ1+A2*HZ2+A3*HZ3+A4*HZ4+A5*HZ5+A6*HZ6+A7*HZ7+A8*HZ8+A9*HZ9
00573 
00574 
00575 c  MAKE THE TERMS IN THE 2ND SUM ("PARALLEL" SYMMETRY):
00576 C
00577 C       I=1
00578 C
00579        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q1**2+1.D0/S1**2)
00580        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q1)
00581        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q1)
00582        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S1)
00583        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S1)
00584        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00585        FX1 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00586        HY1 = EXQS/Q1*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00587        FZ1 = EXQS*CYQ/S1*SZS   *SPS
00588        HX1 = FX1*CT2+FZ1*ST2
00589        HZ1 =-FX1*ST2+FZ1*CT2
00590 
00591        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q1**2+1.D0/S2**2)
00592        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q1)
00593        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q1)
00594        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S2)
00595        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S2)
00596        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00597        FX2 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00598        HY2 = EXQS/Q1*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00599        FZ2 = EXQS*CYQ/S2*SZS   *SPS
00600        HX2 = FX2*CT2+FZ2*ST2
00601        HZ2 =-FX2*ST2+FZ2*CT2
00602 
00603        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q1**2+1.D0/S3**2)
00604        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q1)
00605        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q1)
00606        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S3)
00607        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S3)
00608        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00609        FX3 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00610        HY3 = EXQS/Q1*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00611        FZ3 = EXQS*CYQ/S3*SZS   *SPS
00612        HX3 = FX3*CT2+FZ3*ST2
00613        HZ3 =-FX3*ST2+FZ3*CT2
00614 C
00615 C       I=2
00616 C
00617        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q2**2+1.D0/S1**2)
00618        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q2)
00619        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q2)
00620        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S1)
00621        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S1)
00622        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00623        FX4 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00624        HY4 = EXQS/Q2*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00625        FZ4 = EXQS*CYQ/S1*SZS   *SPS
00626        HX4 = FX4*CT2+FZ4*ST2
00627        HZ4 =-FX4*ST2+FZ4*CT2
00628 
00629        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q2**2+1.D0/S2**2)
00630        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q2)
00631        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q2)
00632        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S2)
00633        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S2)
00634        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00635        FX5 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00636        HY5 = EXQS/Q2*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00637        FZ5 = EXQS*CYQ/S2*SZS   *SPS
00638        HX5 = FX5*CT2+FZ5*ST2
00639        HZ5 =-FX5*ST2+FZ5*CT2
00640 
00641        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q2**2+1.D0/S3**2)
00642        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q2)
00643        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q2)
00644        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S3)
00645        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S3)
00646        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00647        FX6 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00648        HY6 = EXQS/Q2*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00649        FZ6 = EXQS*CYQ/S3*SZS   *SPS
00650        HX6 = FX6*CT2+FZ6*ST2
00651        HZ6 =-FX6*ST2+FZ6*CT2
00652 C
00653 C       I=3
00654 C
00655        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q3**2+1.D0/S1**2)
00656        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q3)
00657        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q3)
00658        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S1)
00659        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S1)
00660        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00661        FX7 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00662        HY7 = EXQS/Q3*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00663        FZ7 = EXQS*CYQ/S1*SZS   *SPS
00664        HX7 = FX7*CT2+FZ7*ST2
00665        HZ7 =-FX7*ST2+FZ7*CT2
00666 
00667        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q3**2+1.D0/S2**2)
00668        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q3)
00669        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q3)
00670        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S2)
00671        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S2)
00672        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00673        FX8 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00674        HY8 = EXQS/Q3*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00675        FZ8 = EXQS*CYQ/S2*SZS   *SPS
00676        HX8 = FX8*CT2+FZ8*ST2
00677        HZ8 =-FX8*ST2+FZ8*CT2
00678 
00679        SQQS= DSQRT(1.D0/Q3**2+1.D0/S3**2)
00680        CYQ = DCOS(Y/Q3)
00681        SYQ = DSIN(Y/Q3)
00682        CZS = DCOS(Z2/S3)
00683        SZS = DSIN(Z2/S3)
00684        EXQS= DEXP(SQQS*X2)
00685        FX9 =-SQQS*EXQS*CYQ*CZS *SPS
00686        HY9 = EXQS/Q3*SYQ*CZS   *SPS
00687        FZ9 = EXQS*CYQ/S3*SZS   *SPS
00688        HX9 = FX9*CT2+FZ9*ST2
00689        HZ9 =-FX9*ST2+FZ9*CT2
00690 
00691        A1=A(19)+A(20)*S2PS
00692        A2=A(21)+A(22)*S2PS
00693        A3=A(23)+A(24)*S2PS
00694        A4=A(25)+A(26)*S2PS
00695        A5=A(27)+A(28)*S2PS
00696        A6=A(29)+A(30)*S2PS
00697        A7=A(31)+A(32)*S2PS
00698        A8=A(33)+A(34)*S2PS
00699        A9=A(35)+A(36)*S2PS
00700 
00701        BX=BX+A1*HX1+A2*HX2+A3*HX3+A4*HX4+A5*HX5+A6*HX6+A7*HX7+A8*HX8
00702      *   +A9*HX9
00703        BY=BY+A1*HY1+A2*HY2+A3*HY3+A4*HY4+A5*HY5+A6*HY6+A7*HY7+A8*HY8
00704      *   +A9*HY9
00705        BZ=BZ+A1*HZ1+A2*HZ2+A3*HZ3+A4*HZ4+A5*HZ5+A6*HZ6+A7*HZ7+A8*HZ8
00706      *   +A9*HZ9
00707 C
00708        RETURN
00709        END
00710 c
00711 c############################################################################
00712 c
00713 C
00714       SUBROUTINE DEFORMED (IOPT,PS,X,Y,Z,BX1,BY1,BZ1,BX2,BY2,BZ2)
00715 C
00716 C   IOPT - TAIL FIELD MODE FLAG:   IOPT=0 - THE TWO TAIL MODES ARE ADDED UP
00717 C                                  IOPT=1 - MODE 1 ONLY
00718 C                                  IOPT=2 - MODE 2 ONLY
00719 C
00720 C   CALCULATES GSM COMPONENTS OF TWO UNIT-AMPLITUDE TAIL FIELD MODES,
00721 C    TAKING INTO ACCOUNT BOTH EFFECTS OF DIPOLE TILT:
00722 C    WARPING IN Y-Z (DONE BY THE S/R WARPED) AND BENDING IN X-Z (DONE BY THIS SUBROUTINE)
00723 C
00724       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
00725       COMMON /RH0/ RH0
00726       DATA RH2,IEPS /-5.2D0,3/
00727 C
00728 C  RH0,RH1,RH2, AND IEPS CONTROL THE TILT-RELATED DEFORMATION OF THE TAIL FIELD
00729 C
00730       SPS=DSIN(PS)
00731       CPS=DSQRT(1.D0-SPS**2)
00732       R2=X**2+Y**2+Z**2
00733       R=SQRT(R2)
00734       ZR=Z/R
00735       RH=RH0+RH2*ZR**2
00736       DRHDR=-ZR/R*2.D0*RH2*ZR
00737       DRHDZ= 2.D0*RH2*ZR/R
00738 C
00739       RRH=R/RH
00740 
00741       F=1.D0/(1.D0+RRH**IEPS)**(1.D0/IEPS)
00742       DFDR=-RRH**(IEPS-1)*F**(IEPS+1)/RH
00743       DFDRH=-RRH*DFDR
00744 c
00745       SPSAS=SPS*F
00746       CPSAS=DSQRT(1.D0-SPSAS**2)
00747 C
00748       XAS=X*CPSAS-Z*SPSAS
00749       ZAS=X*SPSAS+Z*CPSAS
00750 C
00751       FACPS=SPS/CPSAS*(DFDR+DFDRH*DRHDR)/R
00752       PSASX=FACPS*X
00753       PSASY=FACPS*Y
00754       PSASZ=FACPS*Z+SPS/CPSAS*DFDRH*DRHDZ
00755 C
00756       DXASDX=CPSAS-ZAS*PSASX
00757       DXASDY=-ZAS*PSASY
00758       DXASDZ=-SPSAS-ZAS*PSASZ
00759       DZASDX=SPSAS+XAS*PSASX
00760       DZASDY=XAS*PSASY
00761       DZASDZ=CPSAS+XAS*PSASZ
00762       FAC1=DXASDZ*DZASDY-DXASDY*DZASDZ
00763       FAC2=DXASDX*DZASDZ-DXASDZ*DZASDX
00764       FAC3=DZASDX*DXASDY-DXASDX*DZASDY
00765 C
00766 C     DEFORM:
00767 C
00768       CALL WARPED(IOPT,PS,XAS,Y,ZAS,BXAS1,BYAS1,BZAS1,BXAS2,BYAS2,BZAS2)
00769 C
00770       BX1=BXAS1*DZASDZ-BZAS1*DXASDZ +BYAS1*FAC1
00771       BY1=BYAS1*FAC2
00772       BZ1=BZAS1*DXASDX-BXAS1*DZASDX +BYAS1*FAC3
00773 
00774       BX2=BXAS2*DZASDZ-BZAS2*DXASDZ +BYAS2*FAC1
00775       BY2=BYAS2*FAC2
00776       BZ2=BZAS2*DXASDX-BXAS2*DZASDX +BYAS2*FAC3
00777 
00778       RETURN
00779       END
00780 C
00781 C------------------------------------------------------------------
00782 c
00783 C
00784       SUBROUTINE WARPED (IOPT,PS,X,Y,Z,BX1,BY1,BZ1,BX2,BY2,BZ2)
00785 C
00786 C   CALCULATES GSM COMPONENTS OF THE WARPED FIELD FOR TWO TAIL UNIT MODES.
00787 C   THE WARPING DEFORMATION IS IMPOSED ON THE UNWARPED FIELD, COMPUTED
00788 C   BY THE S/R "UNWARPED".  THE WARPING PARAMETERS WERE TAKEN FROM THE
00789 C   RESULTS OF GEOTAIL OBSERVATIONS (TSYGANENKO ET AL. [1998]).
00790 C   NB # 6, P.106, OCT 12, 2000.
00791 C
00792 C   IOPT - TAIL FIELD MODE FLAG:   IOPT=0 - THE TWO TAIL MODES ARE ADDED UP
00793 C                                  IOPT=1 - MODE 1 ONLY
00794 C                                  IOPT=2 - MODE 2 ONLY
00795 C
00796       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
00797 C
00798       COMMON /G/ G
00799       DGDX=0.D0
00800       XL=20.D0
00801       DXLDX=0.D0
00802 
00803       SPS=DSIN(PS)
00804       RHO2=Y**2+Z**2
00805       RHO=DSQRT(RHO2)
00806 
00807       IF (Y.EQ.0.D0.AND.Z.EQ.0.D0) THEN
00808        PHI=0.D0
00809        CPHI=1.D0
00810        SPHI=0.D0
00811       ELSE
00812        PHI=DATAN2(Z,Y)
00813        CPHI=Y/RHO
00814        SPHI=Z/RHO
00815       ENDIF
00816 
00817       RR4L4=RHO/(RHO2**2+XL**4)
00818 
00819       F=PHI+G*RHO2*RR4L4*CPHI*SPS
00820       DFDPHI=1.D0-G*RHO2*RR4L4*SPHI*SPS
00821       DFDRHO=G*RR4L4**2*(3.D0*XL**4-RHO2**2)*CPHI*SPS
00822       DFDX=RR4L4*CPHI*SPS*(DGDX*RHO2-G*RHO*RR4L4*4.D0*XL**3*DXLDX)
00823 
00824       CF=DCOS(F)
00825       SF=DSIN(F)
00826       YAS=RHO*CF
00827       ZAS=RHO*SF
00828 
00829       CALL UNWARPED (IOPT,X,YAS,ZAS,BX_AS1,BY_AS1,BZ_AS1,
00830      *  BX_AS2,BY_AS2,BZ_AS2)
00831 
00832       BRHO_AS =  BY_AS1*CF+BZ_AS1*SF      !   DEFORM THE 1ST MODE
00833       BPHI_AS = -BY_AS1*SF+BZ_AS1*CF
00834 
00835       BRHO_S = BRHO_AS*DFDPHI
00836       BPHI_S = BPHI_AS-RHO*(BX_AS1*DFDX+BRHO_AS*DFDRHO)
00837       BX1    = BX_AS1*DFDPHI
00838 
00839       BY1    = BRHO_S*CPHI-BPHI_S*SPHI
00840       BZ1    = BRHO_S*SPHI+BPHI_S*CPHI    !   DONE
00841 
00842       BRHO_AS =  BY_AS2*CF+BZ_AS2*SF      !   DEFORM THE 2ND MODE
00843       BPHI_AS = -BY_AS2*SF+BZ_AS2*CF
00844 
00845       BRHO_S = BRHO_AS*DFDPHI
00846       BPHI_S = BPHI_AS-RHO*(BX_AS2*DFDX+BRHO_AS*DFDRHO)
00847       BX2    = BX_AS2*DFDPHI
00848 
00849       BY2    = BRHO_S*CPHI-BPHI_S*SPHI
00850       BZ2    = BRHO_S*SPHI+BPHI_S*CPHI    !   DONE
00851 
00852       RETURN
00853       END
00854 C
00855 C%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00856 C
00857        SUBROUTINE UNWARPED (IOPT,X,Y,Z,BX1,BY1,BZ1,BX2,BY2,BZ2)
00858 
00859 C   IOPT - TAIL FIELD MODE FLAG:   IOPT=0 - THE TWO TAIL MODES ARE ADDED UP
00860 C                                  IOPT=1 - MODE 1 ONLY
00861 C                                  IOPT=2 - MODE 2 ONLY
00862 C
00863 C    CALCULATES GSM COMPONENTS OF THE SHIELDED FIELD OF TWO TAIL MODES WITH UNIT
00864 C    AMPLITUDES,  WITHOUT ANY WARPING OR BENDING.  NONLINEAR PARAMETERS OF THE MODES
00865 C    ARE FORWARDED HERE VIA A COMMON BLOCK /TAIL/.
00866 C
00867       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
00868 C
00869 C      REAL*8 A1(60),A2(60)
00870       DIMENSION A1(60),A2(60)  !   TAIL SHIELDING FIELD PARAMETERS FOR THE MODES #1 & #2
00871 
00872       COMMON /TAIL/ DXSHIFT1,DXSHIFT2,D0,DELTADY  ! ATTENTION:  HERE D0 & DELTADY ARE INCLUDED IN /TAIL/
00873 C                                                                  AND EXCLUDED FROM DATA
00874       DATA DELTADX1,ALPHA1,XSHIFT1
00875      *  /1.D0,1.1D0,6.D0/
00876       DATA DELTADX2,ALPHA2,XSHIFT2
00877      *  /0.D0,.25D0,4.D0/
00878 
00879     
00880       DATA A1/-25.45869857D0,57.35899080D0,317.5501869D0,
00881      *-2.626756717D0, -93.38053698D0,-199.6467926D0,
00882      *-858.8129729D0,34.09192395D0,845.4214929D0, 
00883      *-29.07463068D0,47.10678547D0,-128.9797943D0,-781.7512093D0,
00884      *6.165038619D0, 167.8905046D0,492.0680410D0,1654.724031D0,
00885      *-46.77337920D0,-1635.922669D0, 40.86186772D0,
00886      *-.1349775602D0,-.9661991179D-01,-.1662302354D0, 
00887      *.002810467517D0,.2487355077D0,.1025565237D0,-14.41750229D0,
00888      *-.8185333989D0, 11.07693629D0,.7569503173D0,-9.655264745D0,
00889      *112.2446542D0,777.5948964D0, -5.745008536D0,-83.03921993D0,
00890      *-490.2278695D0,-1155.004209D0,39.08023320D0, 1172.780574D0,
00891      *-39.44349797D0,-14.07211198D0,-40.41201127D0,-313.2277343D0, 
00892      *2.203920979D0,8.232835341D0,197.7065115D0,391.2733948D0,
00893      *-18.57424451D0, -437.2779053D0,23.04976898D0,11.75673963D0,
00894      *13.60497313D0,4.691927060D0, 18.20923547D0,27.59044809D0,
00895      *6.677425469D0,1.398283308D0,2.839005878D0, 31.24817706D0,
00896      *24.53577264D0/
00897 
00898       DATA A2/-287187.1962D0,4970.499233D0,410490.1952D0,
00899      *-1347.839052D0,-386370.3240D0,3317.983750D0,-143462.3895D0,
00900      *5706.513767D0, 171176.2904D0, 250.8882750D0,-506570.8891D0,
00901      *5733.592632D0, 397975.5842D0,9771.762168D0, -941834.2436D0,
00902      *7990.975260D0,54313.10318D0,447.5388060D0,528046.3449D0,
00903      *12751.04453D0,-21920.98301D0,-21.05075617D0,31971.07875D0,
00904      *3012.641612D0, -301822.9103D0,-3601.107387D0,1797.577552D0,
00905      *-6.315855803D0,142578.8406D0, 13161.93640D0,804184.8410D0,
00906      *-14168.99698D0,-851926.6360D0,-1890.885671D0, 972475.6869D0,
00907      *-8571.862853D0,26432.49197D0,-2554.752298D0,-482308.3431D0,
00908      *-4391.473324D0,105155.9160D0,-1134.622050D0,-74353.53091D0,
00909      *-5382.670711D0, 695055.0788D0,-916.3365144D0,-12111.06667D0,
00910      *67.20923358D0,-367200.9285D0, -21414.14421D0,14.75567902D0,
00911      *20.75638190D0,59.78601609D0,16.86431444D0, 32.58482365D0,
00912      *23.69472951D0,17.24977936D0,13.64902647D0,68.40989058D0,
00913      *11.67828167D0/
00914 
00915 
00916 C     These are the original DATA statements, but they arent double precision
00917 C     which leads to differences.
00918 C      DATA A1/-25.45869857,57.35899080,317.5501869,-2.626756717,
00919 C     *-93.38053698,-199.6467926,-858.8129729,34.09192395,845.4214929,
00920 C     *-29.07463068,47.10678547,-128.9797943,-781.7512093,6.165038619,
00921 C     *167.8905046,492.0680410,1654.724031,-46.77337920,-1635.922669,
00922 C     *40.86186772,-.1349775602,-.9661991179E-01,-.1662302354,
00923 C     *.002810467517,.2487355077,.1025565237,-14.41750229,-.8185333989,
00924 C     *11.07693629,.7569503173,-9.655264745,112.2446542,777.5948964,
00925 C     *-5.745008536,-83.03921993,-490.2278695,-1155.004209,39.08023320,
00926 C     *1172.780574,-39.44349797,-14.07211198,-40.41201127,-313.2277343,
00927 C     *2.203920979,8.232835341,197.7065115,391.2733948,-18.57424451,
00928 C     *-437.2779053,23.04976898,11.75673963,13.60497313,4.691927060,
00929 C     *18.20923547,27.59044809,6.677425469,1.398283308,2.839005878,
00930 C     *31.24817706,24.53577264/
00931 C
00932 C      DATA A2/-287187.1962,4970.499233,410490.1952,-1347.839052,
00933 C     *-386370.3240,3317.983750,-143462.3895,5706.513767,171176.2904,
00934 C     *250.8882750,-506570.8891,5733.592632,397975.5842,9771.762168,
00935 C     *-941834.2436,7990.975260,54313.10318,447.5388060,528046.3449,
00936 C     *12751.04453,-21920.98301,-21.05075617,31971.07875,3012.641612,
00937 C     *-301822.9103,-3601.107387,1797.577552,-6.315855803,142578.8406,
00938 C     *13161.93640,804184.8410,-14168.99698,-851926.6360,-1890.885671,
00939 C     *972475.6869,-8571.862853,26432.49197,-2554.752298,-482308.3431,
00940 C     *-4391.473324,105155.9160,-1134.622050,-74353.53091,-5382.670711,
00941 C     *695055.0788,-916.3365144,-12111.06667,67.20923358,-367200.9285,
00942 C     *-21414.14421,14.75567902,20.75638190,59.78601609,16.86431444,
00943 C     *32.58482365,23.69472951,17.24977936,13.64902647,68.40989058,
00944 C     *11.67828167/
00945 
00946 
00947 
00948 
00949       DATA XM1,XM2/2*-12.D0/
00950 
00951       IF (IOPT.EQ.2) GOTO 1
00952 
00953       XSC1=(X-XSHIFT1-DXSHIFT1)*ALPHA1-XM1*(ALPHA1-1.D0)
00954       YSC1=Y*ALPHA1
00955       ZSC1=Z*ALPHA1
00956       D0SC1=D0*ALPHA1   ! HERE WE USE A SINGLE VALUE D0 OF THE THICKNESS FOR BOTH MODES
00957 
00958       CALL TAILDISK(D0SC1,DELTADX1,DELTADY,XSC1,YSC1,ZSC1,FX1,FY1,FZ1)
00959       CALL SHLCAR5X5(A1,X,Y,Z,DXSHIFT1,HX1,HY1,HZ1)
00960 
00961       BX1=FX1+HX1
00962       BY1=FY1+HY1
00963       BZ1=FZ1+HZ1
00964 
00965       IF (IOPT.EQ.1) THEN
00966         BX2=0.D0
00967         BY2=0.D0
00968         BZ2=0.D0
00969         RETURN
00970       ENDIF
00971 
00972  1    XSC2=(X-XSHIFT2-DXSHIFT2)*ALPHA2-XM2*(ALPHA2-1.D0)
00973       YSC2=Y*ALPHA2
00974       ZSC2=Z*ALPHA2
00975       D0SC2=D0*ALPHA2   ! HERE WE USE A SINGLE VALUE D0 OF THE THICKNESS FOR BOTH MODES
00976 
00977       CALL TAILDISK(D0SC2,DELTADX2,DELTADY,XSC2,YSC2,ZSC2,FX2,FY2,FZ2)
00978       CALL SHLCAR5X5(A2,X,Y,Z,DXSHIFT2,HX2,HY2,HZ2)
00979 
00980       BX2=FX2+HX2
00981       BY2=FY2+HY2
00982       BZ2=FZ2+HZ2
00983 
00984       IF (IOPT.EQ.2) THEN
00985         BX1=0.D0
00986         BY1=0.D0
00987         BZ1=0.D0
00988         RETURN
00989       ENDIF
00990 
00991       RETURN
00992       END
00993 C
00994 C$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
00995 C
00996       SUBROUTINE TAILDISK(D0,DELTADX,DELTADY,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
00997 c
00998 c      THIS SUBROUTINE COMPUTES THE COMPONENTS OF THE TAIL CURRENT FIELD,
00999 C       SIMILAR TO THAT DESCRIBED BY TSYGANENKO AND PEREDO (1994).  THE
01000 C        DIFFERENCE IS THAT NOW WE USE SPACEWARPING, AS DESCRIBED IN OUR
01001 C         PAPER ON MODELING BIRKELAND CURRENTS (TSYGANENKO AND STERN, 1996)
01002 C          INSTEAD OF SHEARING IT IN THE SPIRIT OF T89 TAIL MODEL.
01003 C
01004       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01005 c
01006       DIMENSION F(5),B(5),C(5)
01007 C
01008       DATA F /-71.09346626D0,-1014.308601D0,-1272.939359D0,
01009      *        -3224.935936D0,-44546.86232D0/
01010       DATA B /10.90101242D0,12.68393898D0,13.51791954D0,14.86775017D0,
01011      *          15.12306404D0/
01012       DATA C /.7954069972D0,.6716601849D0,1.174866319D0,2.565249920D0,
01013      *          10.01986790D0/
01014 C
01015       RHO=DSQRT(X**2+Y**2)
01016       DRHODX=X/RHO
01017       DRHODY=Y/RHO
01018 
01019       DEX=DEXP(X/7.D0)
01020       D=D0+DELTADY*(Y/20.D0)**2  +DELTADX*DEX !   THE LAST TERM (INTRODUCED 10/11/2000) MAKES THE SHEET
01021       DDDY=DELTADY*Y*0.005D0                  !   THICKEN SUNWARD, TO AVOID PROBLEMS IN THE SUBSOLAR REGION
01022       DDDX=DELTADX/7.D0*DEX
01023 C
01024       DZETA=DSQRT(Z**2+D**2)  !  THIS IS THE SAME SIMPLE WAY TO SPREAD
01025 C                                        OUT THE SHEET, AS THAT USED IN T89
01026       DDZETADX=D*DDDX/DZETA
01027       DDZETADY=D*DDDY/DZETA
01028       DDZETADZ=Z/DZETA
01029 
01030 C
01031       DBX=0.D0
01032       DBY=0.D0
01033       DBZ=0.D0
01034 C
01035       DO 1 I=1,5
01036 C
01037       BI=B(I)
01038       CI=C(I)
01039 C
01040       S1=DSQRT((RHO+BI)**2+(DZETA+CI)**2)
01041       S2=DSQRT((RHO-BI)**2+(DZETA+CI)**2)
01042 
01043       DS1DRHO=(RHO+BI)/S1
01044       DS2DRHO=(RHO-BI)/S2
01045       DS1DDZ=(DZETA+CI)/S1
01046       DS2DDZ=(DZETA+CI)/S2
01047 C
01048       DS1DX=DS1DRHO*DRHODX  +DS1DDZ*DDZETADX
01049       DS1DY=DS1DRHO*DRHODY  +   DS1DDZ*DDZETADY
01050       DS1DZ=                      DS1DDZ*DDZETADZ
01051 C
01052       DS2DX=DS2DRHO*DRHODX  +DS2DDZ*DDZETADX
01053       DS2DY=DS2DRHO*DRHODY  +   DS2DDZ*DDZETADY
01054       DS2DZ=                    DS2DDZ*DDZETADZ
01055 C
01056       S1TS2=S1*S2
01057       S1PS2=S1+S2
01058       S1PS2SQ=S1PS2**2
01059 
01060       FAC1=DSQRT(S1PS2SQ-(2.D0*BI)**2)
01061       AS=FAC1/(S1TS2*S1PS2SQ)
01062       DASDS1=(1.D0/(FAC1*S2)-AS/S1PS2*(S2*S2+S1*(3.D0*S1+4.D0*S2)))
01063      *          /(S1*S1PS2)
01064       DASDS2=(1.D0/(FAC1*S1)-AS/S1PS2*(S1*S1+S2*(3.D0*S2+4.D0*S1)))
01065      *          /(S2*S1PS2)
01066 C
01067       DASDX=DASDS1*DS1DX+DASDS2*DS2DX
01068       DASDY=DASDS1*DS1DY+DASDS2*DS2DY
01069       DASDZ=DASDS1*DS1DZ+DASDS2*DS2DZ
01070 C
01071       DBX=DBX-F(I)*X*DASDZ
01072       DBY=DBY-F(I)*Y*DASDZ
01073   1   DBZ=DBZ+F(I)*(2.D0*AS+X*DASDX+Y*DASDY)
01074 
01075       BX=DBX
01076       BY=DBY
01077       BZ=DBZ
01078 
01079       RETURN
01080       END
01081 C
01082 C$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
01083 C
01084 C THIS CODE RETURNS THE SHIELDING FIELD REPRESENTED BY  5x5=25 "CARTESIAN"
01085 C    HARMONICS
01086 C
01087          SUBROUTINE  SHLCAR5X5(A,X,Y,Z,DSHIFT,HX,HY,HZ)
01088 C
01089 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
01090 C  The NLIN coefficients are the amplitudes of the "cartesian"
01091 c    harmonics (A(1)-A(NLIN).
01092 c  The NNP nonlinear parameters (A(NLIN+1)-A(NTOT) are the scales Pi and Ri
01093 C   entering the arguments of exponents, sines, and cosines in each of the
01094 C   NLIN "Cartesian" harmonics
01095 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
01096 C
01097          IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
01098 C
01099          DIMENSION A(60)
01100 C
01101          DHX=0.D0
01102          DHY=0.D0
01103          DHZ=0.D0
01104 
01105          L=0
01106 C
01107          DO 2 I=1,5
01108          RP=1.D0/A(50+I)
01109          CYPI=DCOS(Y*RP)
01110          SYPI=DSIN(Y*RP)
01111 C
01112          DO 2 K=1,5
01113          RR=1.D0/A(55+K)
01114          SZRK=DSIN(Z*RR)
01115          CZRK=DCOS(Z*RR)
01116          SQPR=DSQRT(RP**2+RR**2)
01117          EPR=DEXP(X*SQPR)
01118 C
01119          DBX=-SQPR*EPR*CYPI*SZRK
01120          DBY= RP*EPR*SYPI*SZRK
01121          DBZ=-RR*EPR*CYPI*CZRK
01122 
01123          L=L+2
01124          COEF=A(L-1)+A(L)*DSHIFT
01125 
01126          DHX=DHX+COEF*DBX
01127          DHY=DHY+COEF*DBY
01128          DHZ=DHZ+COEF*DBZ
01129 c
01130   2      CONTINUE
01131 
01132 
01133          HX=DHX
01134          HY=DHY
01135          HZ=DHZ
01136 C
01137       RETURN
01138       END
01139 c
01140 c %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
01141 C
01142       SUBROUTINE BIRK_TOT (IOPB,PS,X,Y,Z,BX11,BY11,BZ11,BX12,BY12,BZ12,
01143      *                          BX21,BY21,BZ21,BX22,BY22,BZ22)
01144 C
01145 C      IOPB -  BIRKELAND FIELD MODE FLAG:
01146 C         IOPB=0 - ALL COMPONENTS
01147 C         IOPB=1 - REGION 1, MODES 1 & 2
01148 C         IOPB=2 - REGION 2, MODES 1 & 2
01149 C
01150       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01151       DIMENSION SH11(86),SH12(86),SH21(86),SH22(86)

01153       COMMON /DPHI_B_RHO0/ DPHI,B,RHO_0,XKAPPA ! PARAMETERS, CONTROL DAY-NIGHT ASYMMETRY OF F.A.C.

01329

01331       CALL BIRK_SHL (SH11,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,HX11,HY11,HZ11)
01332       BX11=FX11+HX11
01333       BY11=FY11+HY11

01338       BX12=FX12+HX12
01339       BY12=FY12+HY12
01340       BZ12=FZ12+HZ12

01343 
01344       XKAPPA=XKAPPA2        !  FORWARDED IN BIRK_1N2
01345       X_SC=XKAPPA2-1.0D0    !  FORWARDED IN BIRK_SHL
01346

01348 
01349       CALL BIRK_1N2 (2,1,PS,X,Y,Z,FX21,FY21,FZ21)           !  REGION 2, MODE 1

01351       BX21=FX21+HX21
01352       BY21=FY21+HY21
01353       BZ21=FZ21+HZ21
01354 
01355       CALL BIRK_1N2 (2,2,PS,X,Y,Z,FX22,FY22,FZ22)           !  REGION 2, MODE 2
01356       CALL BIRK_SHL (SH22,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,HX22,HY22,HZ22)
01357       BX22=FX22+HX22
01358       BY22=FY22+HY22
01359       BZ22=FZ22+HZ22
01360 
01361       ENDIF
01362 
01363       RETURN
01364       END
01365 C
01366 c %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
01367 c
01368 c
01369       SUBROUTINE BIRK_1N2 (NUMB,MODE,PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
01370 C
01371 C  CALCULATES COMPONENTS  OF REGION 1/2 FIELD IN SPHERICAL COORDS.  DERIVED FROM THE S/R DIPDEF2C (WHICH
01372 C    DOES THE SAME JOB, BUT INPUT/OUTPUT THERE WAS IN SPHERICAL COORDS, WHILE HERE WE USE CARTESIAN ONES)
01373 C
01374 C   INPUT:  NUMB=1 (2) FOR REGION 1 (2) CURRENTS
01375 C           MODE=1 YIELDS SIMPLE SINUSOIDAL MLT VARIATION, WITH MAXIMUM CURRENT AT DAWN/DUSK MERIDIAN
01376 C     WHILE MODE=2 YIELDS THE SECOND HARMONIC.
01377 C
01378 C
01379       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01380       DIMENSION A11(31),A12(31),A21(31),A22(31)
01381       COMMON /MODENUM/ M
01382       COMMON /DTHETA/ DTHETA
01383 
01384       COMMON /DPHI_B_RHO0/ DPHI,B,RHO_0,XKAPPA ! THESE PARAMETERS CONTROL DAY-NIGHT ASYMMETRY OF F.A.C., AS FOLLOWS:
01385 
01386 C  (1) DPHI:   HALF-DIFFERENCE (IN RADIANS) BETWEEN DAY AND NIGHT LATITUDE OF FAC OVAL AT IONOSPHERIC ALTITUDE;
01387 C              TYPICAL VALUE: 0.06
01388 C  (2) B:      AN ASYMMETRY FACTOR AT HIGH-ALTITUDES;  FOR B=0, THE ONLY ASYMMETRY IS THAT FROM DPHI
01389 C              TYPICAL VALUES: 0.35-0.70
01390 C  (3) RHO_0:  A FIXED PARAMETER, DEFINING THE DISTANCE RHO, AT WHICH THE LATITUDE SHIFT GRADUALLY SATURATES AND
01391 C              STOPS INCREASING
01392 C              ITS VALUE WAS ASSUMED FIXED, EQUAL TO 7.0.
01393 C  (4) XKAPPA: AN OVERALL SCALING FACTOR, WHICH CAN BE USED FOR CHANGING THE SIZE OF THE F.A.C. OVAL
01394 C
01395       DATA BETA,RH,EPS/0.9D0,10.D0,3.D0/ ! parameters of the tilt-dependent deformation of the untilted F.A.C. field
01396 
01397       DATA A11/.1618068350D0,-.1797957553D0,2.999642482D0,
01398      *-.9322708978D0, -.6811059760D0,.2099057262D0,-8.358815746D0,

01401      *18.95619213D0,.9651528100D0,.4217195118D0,-.08957770020D0,

01439 C     *-.7738802408,.3478293930,-11.37653694,-38.64768867,.6932927651,
01440 C     *-212.4017288,4.944204937,3.071270411,33.05882281,7.387533799,
01441 C     *2.366769108,79.22572682,.6154290178,.5592050551,-.1796585105,
01442 C     *-1.654932210,.7309108776,-.4926292779,-1.130266095,-.009613974555,
01443 C     *.1484586169,-.2215347198,7.883592948,.02768251655,2.950280953,
01444 C     *1.212634762,.5567714182/
01445 C      DATA A21/.1278764024,-.2320034273,1.805623266,-32.37241440,
01446 C     *-.9931490648,.3175085630,-2.492465814,-16.21600096,.2695393416,
01447 C     *-6.752691265,3.971794901,14.54477563,41.10158386,7.912889730,
01448 C     *1.258297372,9.583547721,1.014141963,.5104134759,-.1790430468,
01449 C     *-1.756358428,.7561986717,-.6775248254,-.04014016420,.01446794851,
01450 C     *.1200521731,-.2203584559,4.508963850,.8221623576,1.779933730,
01451 C     *1.102649543,.8867880020/
01452 C      DATA A22/.4036015198,-.3302974212,2.827730930,-45.44405830,
01453 C     *-1.611103927,.4927112073,-.003258457559,-49.59014949,.3796217108,
01454 C     *-233.7884098,4.312666980,18.05051709,28.95320323,11.09948019,
01455 C     *.7471649558,67.10246193,.5667096597,.6468519751,-.1560665317,
01456 C     *-1.460805289,.7719653528,-.6658988668,.2515179349E-05,
01457 C     *.02426021891,.1195003324,-.2625739255,4.377172556,.2421190547,
01458 C     *2.503482679,1.071587299,.7247997430/
01459 
01460       B=0.5D0
01461       RHO_0=7.0D0
01462 
01463       M=MODE
01464       IF (NUMB.EQ.1) THEN
01465           DPHI=0.055D0
01466           DTHETA=0.06D0
01467       ENDIF
01468 
01469       IF (NUMB.EQ.2) THEN
01470           DPHI=0.030D0
01471           DTHETA=0.09D0
01472       ENDIF
01473 
01474       Xsc=X*XKAPPA
01475       Ysc=Y*XKAPPA
01476       Zsc=Z*XKAPPA
01477       RHO=DSQRT(Xsc**2+Zsc**2)
01478 
01479       Rsc=DSQRT(Xsc**2+Ysc**2+Zsc**2)                                 !  SCALED
01480       RHO2=RHO_0**2
01481 
01482       IF (Xsc.EQ.0.D0.AND.Zsc.EQ.0.D0) THEN
01483          PHI=0.D0
01484       ELSE
01485          PHI=DATAN2(-Zsc,Xsc)  !  FROM CARTESIAN TO CYLINDRICAL (RHO,PHI,Y)
01486       ENDIF
01487 
01488       SPHIC=DSIN(PHI)
01489       CPHIC=DCOS(PHI)  !  "C" means "CYLINDRICAL", TO DISTINGUISH FROM SPHERICAL PHI
01490 
01491       BRACK=DPHI+B*RHO2/(RHO2+1.D0)*(RHO**2-1.D0)/(RHO2+RHO**2)
01492       R1RH=(Rsc-1.D0)/RH
01493       PSIAS=BETA*PS/(1.D0+R1RH**EPS)**(1.D0/EPS)
01494 
01495       PHIS=PHI-BRACK*DSIN(PHI) -PSIAS
01496       DPHISPHI=1.D0-BRACK*DCOS(PHI)
01497       DPHISRHO=-2.D0*B*RHO2*RHO/(RHO2+RHO**2)**2 *DSIN(PHI)
01498      *   +BETA*PS*R1RH**(EPS-1.D0)*RHO/(RH*Rsc*
01499      *   (1.D0+R1RH**EPS)**(1.D0/EPS+1.D0))
01500       DPHISDY= BETA*PS*R1RH**(EPS-1.D0)*Ysc/(RH*Rsc*
01501      *   (1.D0+R1RH**EPS)**(1.D0/EPS+1.D0))
01502 
01503       SPHICS=DSIN(PHIS)
01504       CPHICS=DCOS(PHIS)
01505 
01506       XS= RHO*CPHICS
01507       ZS=-RHO*SPHICS
01508 
01509       IF (NUMB.EQ.1) THEN
01510         IF (MODE.EQ.1) CALL TWOCONES (A11,XS,Ysc,ZS,BXS,BYAS,BZS)
01511         IF (MODE.EQ.2) CALL TWOCONES (A12,XS,Ysc,ZS,BXS,BYAS,BZS)
01512       ELSE
01513         IF (MODE.EQ.1) CALL TWOCONES (A21,XS,Ysc,ZS,BXS,BYAS,BZS)
01514         IF (MODE.EQ.2) CALL TWOCONES (A22,XS,Ysc,ZS,BXS,BYAS,BZS)
01515       ENDIF
01516 
01517       BRHOAS=BXS*CPHICS-BZS*SPHICS
01518       BPHIAS=-BXS*SPHICS-BZS*CPHICS
01519 
01520 C                                   ! SCALING
01521       BRHO_S=BRHOAS*DPHISPHI                             *XKAPPA
01522       BPHI_S=(BPHIAS-RHO*(BYAS*DPHISDY+BRHOAS*DPHISRHO)) *XKAPPA
01523       BY_S=BYAS*DPHISPHI                                 *XKAPPA
01524 
01525       BX=BRHO_S*CPHIC-BPHI_S*SPHIC
01526       BY=BY_S
01527       BZ=-BRHO_S*SPHIC-BPHI_S*CPHIC
01528 
01529       RETURN
01530       END
01531 c
01532 C=========================================================================
01533 c
01534       SUBROUTINE TWOCONES (A,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
01535 C
01536 C   ADDS FIELDS FROM TWO CONES (NORTHERN AND SOUTHERN), WITH A PROPER SYMMETRY OF THE CURRENT AND FIELD,
01537 C     CORRESPONDING TO THE REGION 1 BIRKELAND CURRENTS.
01538 C
01539 
01540       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01541       DIMENSION A(31)
01542 
01543       CALL ONE_CONE (A,X,Y,Z,BXN,BYN,BZN)
01544       CALL ONE_CONE (A,X,-Y,-Z,BXS,BYS,BZS)
01545       BX=BXN-BXS
01546       BY=BYN+BYS
01547       BZ=BZN+BZS
01548 
01549       RETURN
01550       END
01551 c
01552 C-------------------------------------------------------------------------
01553 C
01554       SUBROUTINE ONE_CONE(A,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
01555 c
01556 c  RETURNS FIELD COMPONENTS FOR A DEFORMED CONICAL CURRENT SYSTEM, FITTED TO A BIOSAVART FIELD
01557 c    BY SIM_14.FOR.  HERE ONLY THE NORTHERN CONE IS TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT.
01558 c
01559 
01560       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01561       DIMENSION A(31)
01562 
01563       COMMON /DTHETA/ DTHETA
01564       COMMON /MODENUM/ M
01565 
01566       DATA DR,DT/1.D-6,1.D-6/  !   JUST FOR NUMERICAL DIFFERENTIATION
01567 
01568       THETA0=A(31)
01569 
01570       RHO2=X**2+Y**2
01571       RHO=DSQRT(RHO2)
01572       R=DSQRT(RHO2+Z**2)
01573       THETA=DATAN2(RHO,Z)
01574       PHI=DATAN2(Y,X)
01575 C
01576 C   MAKE THE DEFORMATION OF COORDINATES:
01577 C
01578        RS=R_S(A,R,THETA)
01579        THETAS=THETA_S(A,R,THETA)
01580        PHIS=PHI
01581 C
01582 C   CALCULATE FIELD COMPONENTS AT THE NEW POSITION (ASTERISKED):
01583 C
01584        CALL FIALCOS (RS,THETAS,PHIS,BTAST,BFAST,M,THETA0,DTHETA)    !   MODE #M
01585 C
01586 C   NOW TRANSFORM B{R,T,F}_AST BY THE DEFORMATION TENSOR:
01587 C
01588 C      FIRST OF ALL, FIND THE DERIVATIVES:
01589 C
01590        DRSDR=(R_S(A,R+DR,THETA)-R_S(A,R-DR,THETA))/(2.D0*DR)
01591        DRSDT=(R_S(A,R,THETA+DT)-R_S(A,R,THETA-DT))/(2.D0*DT)
01592        DTSDR=(THETA_S(A,R+DR,THETA)-THETA_S(A,R-DR,THETA))/(2.D0*DR)
01593        DTSDT=(THETA_S(A,R,THETA+DT)-THETA_S(A,R,THETA-DT))/(2.D0*DT)
01594 
01595        STSST=DSIN(THETAS)/DSIN(THETA)
01596        RSR=RS/R
01597 
01598        BR     =-RSR/R*STSST*BTAST*DRSDT
01599        BTHETA = RSR*STSST*BTAST*DRSDR
01600        BPHI   = RSR*BFAST*(DRSDR*DTSDT-DRSDT*DTSDR)
01601 
01602        S=RHO/R
01603        C=Z/R
01604        SF=Y/RHO
01605        CF=X/RHO
01606 
01607        BE=BR*S+BTHETA*C
01608 
01609        BX=A(1)*(BE*CF-BPHI*SF)
01610        BY=A(1)*(BE*SF+BPHI*CF)
01611        BZ=A(1)*(BR*C-BTHETA*S)
01612 
01613        RETURN
01614        END
01615 C
01616 C=====================================================================================
01617       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION R_S(A,R,THETA)
01618       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01619       DIMENSION A(31)
01620 C
01621       R_S=R+A(2)/R+A(3)*R/DSQRT(R**2+A(11)**2)+A(4)*R/(R**2+A(12)**2)
01622      *+(A(5)+A(6)/R+A(7)*R/DSQRT(R**2+A(13)**2)+A(8)*R/(R**2+A(14)**2))*
01623      * DCOS(THETA)
01624      *+(A(9)*R/DSQRT(R**2+A(15)**2)+A(10)*R/(R**2+A(16)**2)**2)
01625      * *DCOS(2.D0*THETA)
01626 C
01627       RETURN
01628       END
01629 C
01630 C-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01631 C
01632       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION THETA_S(A,R,THETA)
01633       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01634       DIMENSION A(31)
01635 c
01636       THETA_S=THETA+(A(17)+A(18)/R+A(19)/R**2
01637      *                +A(20)*R/DSQRT(R**2+A(27)**2))*DSIN(THETA)
01638      * +(A(21)+A(22)*R/DSQRT(R**2+A(28)**2)
01639      *                +A(23)*R/(R**2+A(29)**2))*DSIN(2.D0*THETA)
01640      * +(A(24)+A(25)/R+A(26)*R/(R**2+A(30)**2))*DSIN(3.D0*THETA)
01641 C
01642       RETURN
01643       END
01644 C
01645 c!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
01646 c
01647       SUBROUTINE FIALCOS(R,THETA,PHI,BTHETA,BPHI,N,THETA0,DT)
01648 C
01649 C  CONICAL MODEL OF BIRKELAND CURRENT FIELD; BASED ON THE OLD S/R FIALCO (OF 1990-91)
01650 
01651 C  BTN, AND BPN ARE THE ARRAYS OF BTHETA AND BPHI (BTN(i), BPN(i) CORRESPOND TO i-th MODE).
01652 C   ONLY FIRST  N  MODE AMPLITUDES ARE COMPUTED (N<=10).
01653 C    THETA0 IS THE ANGULAR HALF-WIDTH OF THE CONE, DT IS THE ANGULAR H.-W. OF THE CURRENT LAYER
01654 
01655 C   NOTE:  BR=0  (BECAUSE ONLY RADIAL CURRENTS ARE PRESENT IN THIS MODEL)
01656 C
01657       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01658       DIMENSION  BTN(10),BPN(10),CCOS(10),SSIN(10)
01659 
01660       SINTE=DSIN(THETA)
01661       RO=R*SINTE
01662       COSTE=DCOS(THETA)
01663       SINFI=DSIN(PHI)
01664       COSFI=DCOS(PHI)
01665       TG=SINTE/(1.D0+COSTE)   !        TAN(THETA/2)
01666       CTG=SINTE/(1.D0-COSTE)  !        CTG(THETA/2)
01667 C
01668 C
01669       TETANP=THETA0+DT
01670       TETANM=THETA0-DT
01671       IF(THETA.LT.TETANM) GOTO 1
01672       TGP=DTAN(TETANP*0.5D0)
01673       TGM=DTAN(TETANM*0.5D0)
01674       TGM2=TGM*TGM
01675       TGP2=TGP*TGP
01676   1   CONTINUE
01677 
01678       COSM1=1.D0
01679       SINM1=0.D0
01680       TM=1.D0
01681       TGM2M=1.D0
01682       TGP2M=1.D0
01683 
01684       DO 2 M=1,N
01685       TM=TM*TG
01686       CCOS(M)=COSM1*COSFI-SINM1*SINFI
01687       SSIN(M)=SINM1*COSFI+COSM1*SINFI
01688       COSM1=CCOS(M)
01689       SINM1=SSIN(M)
01690       IF(THETA.LT.TETANM) THEN
01691       T=TM
01692       DTT=0.5D0*M*TM*(TG+CTG)
01693       DTT0=0.D0
01694       ELSE IF(THETA.LT.TETANP) THEN
01695       TGM2M=TGM2M*TGM2
01696       FC=1.D0/(TGP-TGM)
01697       FC1=1.D0/(2*M+1)
01698       TGM2M1=TGM2M*TGM
01699       TG21=1.D0+TG*TG
01700       T=FC*(TM*(TGP-TG)+FC1*(TM*TG-TGM2M1/TM))
01701       DTT=0.5D0*M*FC*TG21*(TM/TG*(TGP-TG)-FC1*(TM-TGM2M1/(TM*TG)))
01702       DTT0=0.5D0*FC*((TGP+TGM)*(TM*TG-FC1*(TM*TG-TGM2M1/TM))+
01703      * TM*(1.D0-TGP*TGM)-(1.D0+TGM2)*TGM2M/TM)
01704       ELSE
01705       TGP2M=TGP2M*TGP2
01706       TGM2M=TGM2M*TGM2
01707       FC=1.D0/(TGP-TGM)
01708       FC1=1.D0/(2*M+1)
01709       T=FC*FC1*(TGP2M*TGP-TGM2M*TGM)/TM
01710       DTT=-T*M*0.5D0*(TG+CTG)
01711       ENDIF
01712 
01713       BTN(M)=M*T*CCOS(M)/RO
01714   2   BPN(M)=-DTT*SSIN(M)/R
01715 
01716       BTHETA=BTN(N) *800.
01717       BPHI  =BPN(N) *800.
01718 
01719       RETURN
01720       END
01721 C
01722 C-------------------------------------------------------------------------
01723 C
01724 C
01725          SUBROUTINE BIRK_SHL (A,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
01726 C
01727          IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
01728          DIMENSION A(86)
01729 C
01730          CPS=DCOS(PS)
01731          SPS=DSIN(PS)
01732 
01733          S3PS=2.D0*CPS
01734 C
01735          PST1=PS*A(85)
01736          PST2=PS*A(86)
01737 
01738          ST1=DSIN(PST1)
01739          CT1=DCOS(PST1)
01740          ST2=DSIN(PST2)
01741          CT2=DCOS(PST2)
01742 
01743          X1=X*CT1-Z*ST1
01744          Z1=X*ST1+Z*CT1
01745          X2=X*CT2-Z*ST2
01746          Z2=X*ST2+Z*CT2
01747 C
01748          L=0
01749          GX=0.D0
01750          GY=0.D0
01751          GZ=0.D0
01752 C
01753          DO 1 M=1,2     !    M=1 IS FOR THE 1ST SUM ("PERP." SYMMETRY)
01754 C                          AND M=2 IS FOR THE SECOND SUM ("PARALL." SYMMETRY)
01755              DO 2 I=1,3
01756                   P=A(72+I)
01757                   Q=A(78+I)
01758                   CYPI=DCOS(Y/P)
01759                   CYQI=DCOS(Y/Q)
01760                   SYPI=DSIN(Y/P)
01761                   SYQI=DSIN(Y/Q)
01762 C
01763                 DO 3 K=1,3
01764                    R=A(75+K)
01765                    S=A(81+K)
01766                    SZRK=DSIN(Z1/R)
01767                    CZSK=DCOS(Z2/S)
01768                    CZRK=DCOS(Z1/R)
01769                    SZSK=DSIN(Z2/S)
01770                      SQPR=DSQRT(1.D0/P**2+1.D0/R**2)
01771                      SQQS=DSQRT(1.D0/Q**2+1.D0/S**2)
01772                         EPR=DEXP(X1*SQPR)
01773                         EQS=DEXP(X2*SQQS)
01774 C
01775                   DO 4 N=1,2  ! N=1 IS FOR THE FIRST PART OF EACH COEFFICIENT
01776 C                                AND N=2 IS FOR THE SECOND ONE
01777 
01778                     DO 5 NN=1,2 !   NN = 1,2 FURTHER SPLITS THE COEFFICIENTS INTO 2 PARTS,
01779 C                                         TO TAKE INTO ACCOUNT THE SCALE FACTOR DEPENDENCE
01780 
01781                     IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
01782                          FX=-SQPR*EPR*CYPI*SZRK
01783                          FY=EPR*SYPI*SZRK/P
01784                          FZ=-EPR*CYPI*CZRK/R
01785                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
01786                          IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
01787                           HX=FX
01788                           HY=FY
01789                           HZ=FZ
01790                          ELSE
01791                           HX=FX*X_SC
01792                           HY=FY*X_SC
01793                           HZ=FZ*X_SC
01794                          ENDIF
01795                        ELSE
01796                          IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
01797                           HX=FX*CPS
01798                           HY=FY*CPS
01799                           HZ=FZ*CPS
01800                          ELSE
01801                           HX=FX*CPS*X_SC
01802                           HY=FY*CPS*X_SC
01803                           HZ=FZ*CPS*X_SC
01804                          ENDIF
01805                        ENDIF
01806 
01807                      ELSE                            !   M.EQ.2
01808                          FX=-SPS*SQQS*EQS*CYQI*CZSK
01809                          FY=SPS/Q*EQS*SYQI*CZSK
01810                          FZ=SPS/S*EQS*CYQI*SZSK
01811                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
01812                         IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
01813                           HX=FX
01814                           HY=FY
01815                           HZ=FZ
01816                         ELSE
01817                           HX=FX*X_SC
01818                           HY=FY*X_SC
01819                           HZ=FZ*X_SC
01820                         ENDIF
01821                        ELSE
01822                         IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
01823                          HX=FX*S3PS
01824                          HY=FY*S3PS
01825                          HZ=FZ*S3PS
01826                         ELSE
01827                          HX=FX*S3PS*X_SC
01828                          HY=FY*S3PS*X_SC
01829                          HZ=FZ*S3PS*X_SC
01830                         ENDIF
01831                        ENDIF
01832                   ENDIF
01833        L=L+1
01834 
01835        IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
01836        HXR=HX*CT1+HZ*ST1
01837        HZR=-HX*ST1+HZ*CT1
01838        ELSE
01839        HXR=HX*CT2+HZ*ST2
01840        HZR=-HX*ST2+HZ*CT2
01841        ENDIF
01842 
01843        GX=GX+HXR*A(L)
01844        GY=GY+HY *A(L)
01845   5    GZ=GZ+HZR*A(L)
01846 
01847   4   CONTINUE
01848   3   CONTINUE
01849   2   CONTINUE
01850   1   CONTINUE
01851 
01852       BX=GX
01853       BY=GY
01854       BZ=GZ
01855 
01856       RETURN
01857       END
01858 
01859 C
01860 C************************************************************************************
01861 C
01862       SUBROUTINE FULL_RC (IOPR,PS,X,Y,Z,BXSRC,BYSRC,BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,
01863      *  BZPRC)
01864 C
01865 C   CALCULATES GSM FIELD COMPONENTS OF THE SYMMETRIC (SRC) AND PARTIAL (PRC) COMPONENTS OF THE RING CURRENT
01866 C   SRC  PROVIDES A DEPRESSION OF -28 nT AT EARTH
01867 C   PRC  CORRESPONDS TO THE PRESSURE DIFFERENCE OF 2 nPa BETWEEN MIDNIGHT AND NOON RING CURRENT
01868 C             PARTICLE PRESSURE AND YIELDS A DEPRESSION OF -17 nT AT X=-6Re
01869 C
01870 C   SC_SY AND SC_PR ARE SCALING FACTORS FOR THE SYMMETRIC AND PARTIAL COMPONENTS:
01871 C          VALUES LARGER THAN 1 RESULT IN SPATIALLY LARGER CURRENTS
01872 C
01873 C   PHI IS THE ROTATION ANGLE IN RADIANS OF THE PARTIAL RING CURRENT (MEASURED FROM MIDNIGHT TOWARD DUSK)
01874 C
01875 C     IOPR -  A RING CURRENT CALCULATION FLAG (FOR LEAST-SQUARES FITTING ONLY):
01876 C             IOPR=0 - BOTH SRC AND PRC FIELDS ARE CALCULATED
01877 C             IOPR=1 - SRC ONLY
01878 C             IOPR=2 - PRC ONLY
01879 C
01880         IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
01881         DIMENSION C_SY(86),C_PR(86)
01882         COMMON /RCPAR/ SC_SY,SC_PR,PHI
01883 C
01884       DATA C_SY/1675.694858D0,1780.006388D0,-961.6082149D0,
01885      *-1668.914259D0, -27.40437029D0,-107.4169670D0,27.76189943D0,
01886      *92.89740503D0,-43.92949274D0, -403.6444072D0,6.167161865D0,
01887      *298.2779761D0,-1680.779044D0,-1780.933039D0, 964.1861088D0,
01888      *1670.988659D0,27.48864650D0,107.7809519D0,-27.84600972D0, 
01889      *-93.20691865D0,44.28496784D0,404.4537249D0,-6.281958730D0,
01890      *-298.6050952D0, -7.971914848D0,2.017383761D0,-1.492230168D0,
01891      *-1.957411655D0,-.08525523181D0, -.3811813235D0,.08446716725D0,
01892      *.3215044399D0,-.7141912767D0,-.9086294596D0, .2966677742D0,
01893      *-.04736679933D0,-11.38731325D0,.1719795189D0,1.356233066D0, 
01894      *.8613438429D0,-.09143823092D0,-.2593979098D0,.04244838338D0,
01895      *.06318383319D0, -.5861372726D0,-.03368780733D0,-.07104470269D0,
01896      *-.06909052953D0, -60.18659631D0,-32.87563877D0,11.76450433D0,
01897      *5.891673644D0,2.562360333D0, 6.215377232D0,-1.273945165D0,
01898      *-1.864704763D0,-5.394837143D0,-8.799382627D0, 3.743066561D0,
01899      *-.7649164511D0,57.09210569D0,32.61236511D0,-11.28688017D0, 
01900      *-5.849523392D0,-2.470635922D0,-5.961417272D0,1.230031099D0,
01901      *1.793192595D0, 5.383736074D0,8.369895153D0,-3.611544412D0,
01902      *.7898988697D0,7.970609948D0, 7.981216562D0,35.16822497D0,

01914      *145.2377187D0,-4.472639098D0, -3.554312754D0,2.936973114D0,
01915      *2.682302576D0,2.728979958D0,26.43396781D0, -9.312348296D0,
01916      *-29.65427726D0,-247.5855336D0,-206.9111326D0,74.25277664D0, 
01917      *106.4069993D0,15.45391072D0,16.35943569D0,-5.965177750D0,
01918      *-6.079451700D0, 115.6748385D0,-35.27377307D0,-32.28763497D0,
01919      *-32.53122151D0,93.74409310D0, 84.25677504D0,-29.23010465D0,
01920      *-43.79485175D0,-6.434679514D0,-6.620247951D0, 2.443524317D0,
01921      *2.266538956D0,-43.82903825D0,6.904117876D0,12.24289401D0, 
01922      *17.62014361D0,152.3078796D0,124.5505289D0,-44.58690290D0,
01923      *-63.02382410D0, -8.999368955D0,-9.693774119D0,3.510930306D0,
01924      *3.770949738D0,-77.96705716D0, 22.07730961D0,20.46491655D0,
01925      *18.67728847D0,9.451290614D0,9.313661792D0, 644.7620970D0,
01926      *418.2515954D0,7.183754387D0,35.62128817D0,19.43180682D0,

01940 C     *-.5861372726,-.03368780733,-.07104470269,-.06909052953,

01943 C     *3.743066561,-.7649164511,57.09210569,32.61236511,-11.28688017,
