01951 C     *-36.56316878,124.6614669,56.75637955,-87.56841077,5848.631425,
01952 C     *4981.097722,-6233.712207,-10986.40188,68716.52057,65682.69473,
01953 C     *-69673.32198,-138829.3568,43.45817708,-117.9565488,-62.14836263,
01954 C     *79.83651604,-6211.451069,-5151.633113,6544.481271,11353.03491,
01955 C     *23.72352603,-256.4846331,25.77629189,145.2377187,-4.472639098,
01956 C     *-3.554312754,2.936973114,2.682302576,2.728979958,26.43396781,
01957 C     *-9.312348296,-29.65427726,-247.5855336,-206.9111326,74.25277664,
01958 C     *106.4069993,15.45391072,16.35943569,-5.965177750,-6.079451700,
01959 C     *115.6748385,-35.27377307,-32.28763497,-32.53122151,93.74409310,
01960 C     *84.25677504,-29.23010465,-43.79485175,-6.434679514,-6.620247951,
01961 C     *2.443524317,2.266538956,-43.82903825,6.904117876,12.24289401,
01962 C     *17.62014361,152.3078796,124.5505289,-44.58690290,-63.02382410,
01963 C     *-8.999368955,-9.693774119,3.510930306,3.770949738,-77.96705716,
01964 C     *22.07730961,20.46491655,18.67728847,9.451290614,9.313661792,
01965 C     *644.7620970,418.2515954,7.183754387,35.62128817,19.43180682,
01966 C     *39.57218411,15.69384715,7.123215241,2.300635346,21.90881131,
01967 C     *-.01775839370,.3996346710/
01968 
01969         CALL SRC_PRC (IOPR,SC_SY,SC_PR,PHI,PS,X,Y,Z,HXSRC,HYSRC,HZSRC,
01970      *      HXPRC,HYPRC,HZPRC)
01971 
01972         X_SC=SC_SY-1.D0
01973         IF (IOPR.EQ.0.OR.IOPR.EQ.1) THEN
01974           CALL RC_SHIELD (C_SY,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,FSX,FSY,FSZ)
01975         ELSE
01976            FSX=0.D0
01977            FSY=0.D0
01978            FSZ=0.D0
01979         ENDIF
01980 
01981         X_SC=SC_PR-1.D0
01982         IF (IOPR.EQ.0.OR.IOPR.EQ.2) THEN
01983           CALL RC_SHIELD (C_PR,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,FPX,FPY,FPZ)
01984         ELSE
01985            FPX=0.D0
01986            FPY=0.D0
01987            FPZ=0.D0
01988         ENDIF
01989 
01990         BXSRC=HXSRC+FSX
01991         BYSRC=HYSRC+FSY
01992         BZSRC=HZSRC+FSZ
01993 
01994         BXPRC=HXPRC+FPX
01995         BYPRC=HYPRC+FPY
01996         BZPRC=HZPRC+FPZ
01997 
01998         RETURN
01999         END
02000 C---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02001 C
02002        SUBROUTINE SRC_PRC (IOPR,SC_SY,SC_PR,PHI,PS,X,Y,Z,BXSRC,BYSRC,
02003      *    BZSRC,BXPRC,BYPRC,BZPRC)
02004 C
02005 C   RETURNS FIELD COMPONENTS FROM A MODEL RING CURRENT, INCLUDING ITS SYMMETRIC PART
02006 C     AND A PARTIAL RING CURRENT, CLOSED VIA BIRKELAND CURRENTS. BASED ON RESULTS, DESCRIBED
02007 C     IN A PAPER "MODELING THE INNER MAGNETOSPHERE: ASYMMETRIC RING CURRENT AND REGION 2
02008 C     BIRKELAND CURRENTS REVISITED" (JGR, DEC.2000).
02009 C
02010 C     IOPR -  A RING CURRENT CALCULATION FLAG (FOR LEAST-SQUARES FITTING ONLY):
02011 C             IOPR=0 - BOTH SRC AND PRC FIELDS ARE CALCULATED
02012 C             IOPR=1 - SRC ONLY
02013 C             IOPR=2 - PRC ONLY
02014 C
02015 C     SC_SY &  SC_PR ARE SCALE FACTORS FOR THE ABOVE COMPONENTS;  TAKING SC<1 OR SC>1 MAKES THE CURRENTS
02016 C                      SHRINK OR EXPAND, RESPECTIVELY.
02017 C
02018 C   PHI IS THE ROTATION ANGLE (RADIANS) OF THE PARTIAL RING CURRENT (MEASURED FROM MIDNIGHT TOWARD DUSK)
02019 C
02020         IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02021 c
02022 c   1.  TRANSFORM TO TILTED COORDINATES (i.e., SM coordinates):
02023 C
02024         CPS=DCOS(PS)
02025         SPS=DSIN(PS)
02026 
02027         XT=X*CPS-Z*SPS
02028         ZT=Z*CPS+X*SPS
02029 C
02030 C   2.  SCALE THE COORDINATES FOR THE SYMMETRIC AND PARTIAL RC COMPONENTS:
02031 C
02032         XTS=XT/SC_SY    !  SYMMETRIC
02033         YTS=Y /SC_SY
02034         ZTS=ZT/SC_SY
02035 
02036         XTA=XT/SC_PR    !  PARTIAL
02037         YTA=Y /SC_PR
02038         ZTA=ZT/SC_PR
02039 C
02040 C   3.  CALCULATE COMPONENTS OF THE TOTAL FIELD IN THE TILTED (SOLAR-MAGNETIC) COORDINATE SYSTEM:
02041 C
02042 C
02043 C    3a. SYMMETRIC FIELD:
02044 C
02045         IF (IOPR.LE.1) CALL RC_SYMM(XTS,YTS,ZTS,BXS,BYS,BZS)
02046         IF (IOPR.EQ.0.OR.IOPR.EQ.2)
02047      *                 CALL PRC_SYMM(XTA,YTA,ZTA,BXA_S,BYA_S,BZA_S)
02048 
02049 
02050 C    3b. ROTATE THE SCALED SM COORDINATES BY PHI AROUND ZSM AXIS AND CALCULATE QUADRUPOLE PRC FIELD
02051 C         IN THOSE COORDS:
02052 
02053         CP=DCOS(PHI)
02054         SP=DSIN(PHI)
02055         XR=XTA*CP-YTA*SP
02056         YR=XTA*SP+YTA*CP
02057 
02058         IF (IOPR.EQ.0.OR.IOPR.EQ.2)
02059      *                 CALL PRC_QUAD(XR,YR,ZTA,BXA_QR,BYA_QR,BZA_Q)
02060 
02061 
02062 C    3c. TRANSFORM THE QUADRUPOLE FIELD COMPONENTS BACK TO THE SM COORDS:
02063 C
02064         BXA_Q= BXA_QR*CP+BYA_QR*SP
02065         BYA_Q=-BXA_QR*SP+BYA_QR*CP
02066 
02067 C    3d. FIND THE TOTAL FIELD OF PRC (SYMM.+QUADR.) IN THE SM COORDS:
02068 C
02069         BXP=BXA_S+BXA_Q
02070         BYP=BYA_S+BYA_Q
02071         BZP=BZA_S+BZA_Q
02072 C
02073 C   4.  TRANSFORM THE FIELDS OF BOTH PARTS OF THE RING CURRENT BACK TO THE GSM SYSTEM:
02074 C
02075         BXSRC=BXS*CPS+BZS*SPS   !    SYMMETRIC RC
02076         BYSRC=BYS
02077         BZSRC=BZS*CPS-BXS*SPS
02078 C
02079         BXPRC=BXP*CPS+BZP*SPS   !    PARTIAL RC
02080         BYPRC=BYP
02081         BZPRC=BZP*CPS-BXP*SPS
02082 C
02083         RETURN
02084         END
02085 C
02086 C&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
02087 C
02088       SUBROUTINE RC_SYMM (X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02089       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02090       DATA DS,DC/1.D-2,0.99994999875D0/, D/1.D-4/,DRD/5.D3/  ! DS=SIN(THETA) AT THE BOUNDARY OF THE LINEARITY
02091                                                                         REGION; DC=SQRT(1-DS**2);  DRD=1/(2*D)
02092       RHO2=X**2+Y**2
02093       R2=RHO2+Z**2
02094       R=DSQRT(R2)
02095       RP=R+D
02096       RM=R-D
02097       SINT=DSQRT(RHO2)/R
02098       COST=Z/R
02099 
02100       IF (SINT.LT.DS) THEN  !  TOO CLOSE TO THE Z-AXIS; USING A LINEAR APPROXIMATION A_PHI~SINT,
02101 C                                    TO AVOID THE SINGULARITY PROBLEM
02102         A=AP(R,DS,DC)/DS
02103         DARDR=(RP*AP(RP,DS,DC)-RM*AP(RM,DS,DC))*DRD
02104         FXY=Z*(2.D0*A-DARDR)/(R*R2)
02105         BX=FXY*X
02106         BY=FXY*Y
02107         BZ=(2.D0*A*COST**2+DARDR*SINT**2)/R
02108 
02109        ELSE
02110 
02111         THETA=DATAN2(SINT,COST)
02112         TP=THETA+D
02113         TM=THETA-D
02114         SINTP=DSIN(TP)
02115         SINTM=DSIN(TM)
02116         COSTP=DCOS(TP)
02117         COSTM=DCOS(TM)
02118         BR=(SINTP*AP(R,SINTP,COSTP)-SINTM*AP(R,SINTM,COSTM))
02119      *       /(R*SINT)*DRD
02120         BT=(RM*AP(RM,SINT,COST)-RP*AP(RP,SINT,COST))/R*DRD
02121         FXY=(BR+BT*COST/SINT)/R
02122 
02123         BX=FXY*X
02124         BY=FXY*Y
02125         BZ=BR*COST-BT*SINT
02126 
02127       ENDIF
02128 
02129       RETURN
02130       END
02131 c
02132 c&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
02133 C
02134       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION AP(R,SINT,COST)
02135 C
02136 C      Calculates azimuthal component of the vector potential of the symmetric
02137 c  part of the model ring current.
02138 C
02139       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02140       LOGICAL PROX   !  INDICATES WHETHER WE ARE TOO CLOSE TO THE AXIS OF SYMMETRY, WHERE THE INVERSION
02141 C                                                             OF DIPOLAR COORDINATES BECOMES INACCURATE
02142       DATA A1,A2,RRC1,DD1,RRC2,DD2,P1,R1,DR1,DLA1,P2,R2,DR2,DLA2,P3,
02143      *R3,DR3/-563.3722359D0,425.0891691D0,4.150588549D0,2.266150226D0,
02144      * 3.334503403D0,3.079071195D0,.02602428295D0,8.937790598D0,
02145      * 3.327934895D0,4487061833D0,.09125832351D0,6.243029867D0,
02146      * 1.750145910D0,.4181957162D0,.06106691992D0,2.079908581D0,
02147      * .6828548533D0/
02148 
02149       PROX=.FALSE.
02150       SINT1=SINT
02151       COST1=COST
02152       IF (SINT1.LT.1.D-2) THEN  !  TOO CLOSE TO Z-AXIS;  USE LINEAR INTERPOLATION BETWEEN SINT=0 & SINT=0.01
02153         SINT1=1.D-2
02154         COST1=.99994999875
02155         PROX=.TRUE.
02156       ENDIF
02157 
02158          ALPHA=SINT1**2/R         !  R,THETA -> ALPHA,GAMMA
02159          GAMMA=COST1/R**2
02160 
02161          ARG1=-((R-R1)/DR1)**2-(COST1/DLA1)**2
02162          ARG2=-((R-R2)/DR2)**2-(COST1/DLA2)**2
02163          ARG3=-((R-R3)/DR3)**2
02164 
02165          IF (ARG1.LT.-500.D0) THEN        !   TO PREVENT "FLOATING UNDERFLOW" CRASHES
02166            DEXP1=0.D0
02167          ELSE
02168            DEXP1=DEXP(ARG1)
02169          ENDIF
02170 
02171          IF (ARG2.LT.-500.D0) THEN
02172            DEXP2=0.D0
02173          ELSE
02174            DEXP2=DEXP(ARG2)
02175          ENDIF
02176 
02177          IF (ARG3.LT.-500.D0) THEN
02178            DEXP3=0.D0
02179          ELSE
02180            DEXP3=DEXP(ARG3)
02181          ENDIF
02182 
02183 
02184          ALPHA_S=ALPHA*(1.D0+P1*DEXP1+P2*DEXP2+P3*DEXP3)     !  ALPHA -> ALPHA_S  (DEFORMED)
02185 
02186 
02187          GAMMA_S=GAMMA
02188          GAMMAS2=GAMMA_S**2
02189 
02190 
02191          ALSQH=ALPHA_S**2/2.D0            !  ALPHA_S,GAMMA_S -> RS,SINTS,COSTS
02192          F=64.D0/27.D0*GAMMAS2+ALSQH**2
02193          Q=(DSQRT(F)+ALSQH)**(1.D0/3.D0)
02194          C=Q-4.D0*GAMMAS2**(1.D0/3.D0)/(3.D0*Q)
02195          IF (C.LT.0.D0) C=0.D0
02196          G=DSQRT(C**2+4.D0*GAMMAS2**(1.D0/3.D0))
02197          RS=4.D0/((DSQRT(2.D0*G-C)+DSQRT(C))*(G+C))
02198          COSTS=GAMMA_S*RS**2
02199          SINTS=DSQRT(1.D0-COSTS**2)
02200          RHOS=RS*SINTS
02201          RHOS2=RHOS**2
02202          ZS=RS*COSTS
02203 C
02204 c  1st loop:
02205 
02206          P=(RRC1+RHOS)**2+ZS**2+DD1**2
02207          XK2=4.D0*RRC1*RHOS/P
02208          XK=SQRT(XK2)
02209          XKRHO12=XK*SQRT(RHOS)
02210 C
02211       XK2S=1.D0-XK2
02212       DL=DLOG(1.D0/XK2S)
02213       ELK=1.38629436112d0+XK2S*(0.09666344259D0+XK2S*(0.03590092383+
02214      *     XK2S*(0.03742563713+XK2S*0.01451196212))) +DL*
02215      *     (0.5D0+XK2S*(0.12498593597D0+XK2S*(0.06880248576D0+
02216      *     XK2S*(0.03328355346D0+XK2S*0.00441787012D0))))
02217       ELE=1.D0+XK2S*(0.44325141463D0+XK2S*(0.0626060122D0+XK2S*
02218      *      (0.04757383546D0+XK2S*0.01736506451D0))) +DL*
02219      *     XK2S*(0.2499836831D0+XK2S*(0.09200180037D0+XK2S*
02220      *       (0.04069697526D0+XK2S*0.00526449639D0)))
02221 C
02222       APHI1=((1.D0-XK2*0.5D0)*ELK-ELE)/XKRHO12
02223 c
02224 c  2nd loop:
02225 
02226          P=(RRC2+RHOS)**2+ZS**2+DD2**2
02227          XK2=4.D0*RRC2*RHOS/P
02228          XK=SQRT(XK2)
02229          XKRHO12=XK*SQRT(RHOS)
02230 C
02231       XK2S=1.D0-XK2
02232       DL=DLOG(1.D0/XK2S)
02233       ELK=1.38629436112d0+XK2S*(0.09666344259D0+XK2S*(0.03590092383+
02234      *     XK2S*(0.03742563713+XK2S*0.01451196212))) +DL*
02235      *     (0.5D0+XK2S*(0.12498593597D0+XK2S*(0.06880248576D0+
02236      *     XK2S*(0.03328355346D0+XK2S*0.00441787012D0))))
02237       ELE=1.D0+XK2S*(0.44325141463D0+XK2S*(0.0626060122D0+XK2S*
02238      *      (0.04757383546D0+XK2S*0.01736506451D0))) +DL*
02239      *     XK2S*(0.2499836831D0+XK2S*(0.09200180037D0+XK2S*
02240      *       (0.04069697526D0+XK2S*0.00526449639D0)))
02241 C
02242        APHI2=((1.D0-XK2*0.5D0)*ELK-ELE)/XKRHO12
02243 
02244        AP=A1*APHI1+A2*APHI2
02245        IF (PROX) AP=AP*SINT/SINT1   !   LINEAR INTERPOLATION, IF TOO CLOSE TO THE Z-AXIS
02246 
02247 C
02248        RETURN
02249        END
02250 c
02251 c@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
02252 C
02253       SUBROUTINE PRC_SYMM (X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02254       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02255       DATA DS,DC/1.D-2,0.99994999875D0/, D/1.D-4/,DRD/5.D3/  ! DS=SIN(THETA) AT THE BOUNDARY OF THE LINEARITY
02256                                                                         REGION; DC=SQRT(1-DS**2);  DRD=1/(2*D)
02257       RHO2=X**2+Y**2
02258       R2=RHO2+Z**2
02259       R=DSQRT(R2)
02260       RP=R+D
02261       RM=R-D
02262       SINT=DSQRT(RHO2)/R
02263       COST=Z/R
02264 
02265       IF (SINT.LT.DS) THEN  !  TOO CLOSE TO THE Z-AXIS; USING A LINEAR APPROXIMATION A_PHI~SINT,
02266 C                                    TO AVOID THE SINGULARITY PROBLEM
02267         A=APPRC(R,DS,DC)/DS
02268         DARDR=(RP*APPRC(RP,DS,DC)-RM*APPRC(RM,DS,DC))*DRD
02269         FXY=Z*(2.D0*A-DARDR)/(R*R2)
02270         BX=FXY*X
02271         BY=FXY*Y
02272         BZ=(2.D0*A*COST**2+DARDR*SINT**2)/R
02273 
02274        ELSE
02275 
02276         THETA=DATAN2(SINT,COST)
02277         TP=THETA+D
02278         TM=THETA-D
02279         SINTP=DSIN(TP)
02280         SINTM=DSIN(TM)
02281         COSTP=DCOS(TP)
02282         COSTM=DCOS(TM)
02283         BR=(SINTP*APPRC(R,SINTP,COSTP)-SINTM*APPRC(R,SINTM,COSTM))
02284      *       /(R*SINT)*DRD
02285         BT=(RM*APPRC(RM,SINT,COST)-RP*APPRC(RP,SINT,COST))/R*DRD
02286         FXY=(BR+BT*COST/SINT)/R
02287         BX=FXY*X
02288         BY=FXY*Y
02289         BZ=BR*COST-BT*SINT
02290 
02291       ENDIF
02292 
02293       RETURN
02294       END
02295 c
02296 c&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
02297 C
02298 C
02299       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION APPRC(R,SINT,COST)
02300 C
02301 C      Calculates azimuthal component of the vector potential of the symmetric
02302 c  part of the model PARTIAL ring current.
02303 C
02304       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02305       LOGICAL PROX
02306       DATA A1,A2,RRC1,DD1,RRC2,DD2,P1,ALPHA1,DAL1,BETA1,DG1,P2,ALPHA2,
02307      * DAL2,BETA2,DG2,BETA3,P3,ALPHA3,DAL3,BETA4,DG3,BETA5,Q0,Q1,ALPHA4,
02308      * DAL4,DG4,Q2,ALPHA5,DAL5,DG5,BETA6,BETA7
02309      * /-80.11202281D0,12.58246758D0,6.560486035D0,1.930711037D0,
02310      * 3.827208119D0, .7789990504D0,.3058309043D0,.1817139853D0,
02311      * .1257532909D0,3.422509402D0, .04742939676D0,-4.800458958D0,
02312      * -.02845643596D0,.2188114228D0,2.545944574D0, .00813272793D0,
02313      * .35868244D0,103.1601001D0,-.00764731187D0,.1046487459D0, 
02314      * 2.958863546D0,.01172314188D0,.4382872938D0,.01134908150D0,
02315      * 14.51339943D0, .2647095287D0,.07091230197D0,.01512963586D0,
02316      * 6.861329631D0,.1677400816D0, .04433648846D0,.05553741389D0,
02317      * .7665599464D0,.7277854652D0/
02318 
02319       PROX=.FALSE.
02320       SINT1=SINT
02321       COST1=COST
02322       IF (SINT1.LT.1.D-2) THEN  !  TOO CLOSE TO Z-AXIS;  USE LINEAR INTERPOLATION BETWEEN SINT=0 & SINT=0.01
02323         SINT1=1.D-2
02324         COST1=.99994999875D0
02325         PROX=.TRUE.
02326       ENDIF
02327 
02328          ALPHA=SINT1**2/R         !  R,THETA -> ALPHA,GAMMA
02329          GAMMA=COST1/R**2
02330 
02331          ARG1=-(GAMMA/DG1)**2
02332          ARG2=-((ALPHA-ALPHA4)/DAL4)**2-(GAMMA/DG4)**2
02333 
02334          IF (ARG1.LT.-500.D0) THEN        !   TO PREVENT "FLOATING UNDERFLOW" CRASHES
02335            DEXP1=0.D0
02336          ELSE
02337            DEXP1=DEXP(ARG1)
02338          ENDIF
02339 
02340          IF (ARG2.LT.-500.D0) THEN        !   TO PREVENT "FLOATING UNDERFLOW" CRASHES
02341            DEXP2=0.D0
02342          ELSE
02343            DEXP2=DEXP(ARG2)
02344          ENDIF
02345 
02346          ALPHA_S=ALPHA*(1.D0+P1/(1.D0+((ALPHA-ALPHA1)/DAL1)**2)**BETA1
02347      * *DEXP1+P2*(ALPHA-ALPHA2)/(1.D0+((ALPHA-ALPHA2)/DAL2)**2)**BETA2
02348      */(1.D0+(GAMMA/DG2)**2)**BETA3
02349      *+P3*(ALPHA-ALPHA3)**2/(1.D0+((ALPHA-ALPHA3)/DAL3)**2)**BETA4
02350      */(1.D0+(GAMMA/DG3)**2)**BETA5)     !  ALPHA -> ALPHA_S  (DEFORMED)
02351 
02352 
02353          GAMMA_S=GAMMA*(1.D0+Q0+Q1*(ALPHA-ALPHA4)*DEXP2              !  GAMMA -> GAMMA_  (DEFORMED)
02354      * +Q2*(ALPHA-ALPHA5)/(1.D0+((ALPHA-ALPHA5)/DAL5)**2)**BETA6
02355      * /(1.D0+(GAMMA/DG5)**2)**BETA7)
02356 
02357          GAMMAS2=GAMMA_S**2
02358 
02359          ALSQH=ALPHA_S**2/2.D0                            !  ALPHA_S,GAMMA_S -> RS,SINTS,COSTS
02360          F=64.D0/27.D0*GAMMAS2+ALSQH**2
02361          Q=(DSQRT(F)+ALSQH)**(1.D0/3.D0)
02362          C=Q-4.D0*GAMMAS2**(1.D0/3.D0)/(3.D0*Q)
02363          IF (C.LT.0.D0) C=0.D0
02364          G=DSQRT(C**2+4.D0*GAMMAS2**(1.D0/3.D0))
02365          RS=4.D0/((DSQRT(2.D0*G-C)+DSQRT(C))*(G+C))
02366          COSTS=GAMMA_S*RS**2
02367          SINTS=DSQRT(1.D0-COSTS**2)
02368          RHOS=RS*SINTS
02369          RHOS2=RHOS**2
02370          ZS=RS*COSTS
02371 C
02372 c  1st loop:
02373 
02374          P=(RRC1+RHOS)**2+ZS**2+DD1**2
02375          XK2=4.D0*RRC1*RHOS/P
02376          XK=SQRT(XK2)
02377          XKRHO12=XK*SQRT(RHOS)
02378 C
02379       XK2S=1.D0-XK2
02380       DL=DLOG(1.D0/XK2S)
02381       ELK=1.38629436112d0+XK2S*(0.09666344259D0+XK2S*(0.03590092383+
02382      *     XK2S*(0.03742563713+XK2S*0.01451196212))) +DL*
02383      *     (0.5D0+XK2S*(0.12498593597D0+XK2S*(0.06880248576D0+
02384      *     XK2S*(0.03328355346D0+XK2S*0.00441787012D0))))
02385       ELE=1.D0+XK2S*(0.44325141463D0+XK2S*(0.0626060122D0+XK2S*
02386      *      (0.04757383546D0+XK2S*0.01736506451D0))) +DL*
02387      *     XK2S*(0.2499836831D0+XK2S*(0.09200180037D0+XK2S*
02388      *       (0.04069697526D0+XK2S*0.00526449639D0)))
02389 C
02390       APHI1=((1.D0-XK2*0.5D0)*ELK-ELE)/XKRHO12
02391 c
02392 c  2nd loop:
02393 
02394          P=(RRC2+RHOS)**2+ZS**2+DD2**2
02395          XK2=4.D0*RRC2*RHOS/P
02396          XK=SQRT(XK2)
02397          XKRHO12=XK*SQRT(RHOS)
02398 C
02399       XK2S=1.D0-XK2
02400       DL=DLOG(1.D0/XK2S)
02401       ELK=1.38629436112d0+XK2S*(0.09666344259D0+XK2S*(0.03590092383+
02402      *     XK2S*(0.03742563713+XK2S*0.01451196212))) +DL*
02403      *     (0.5D0+XK2S*(0.12498593597D0+XK2S*(0.06880248576D0+
02404      *     XK2S*(0.03328355346D0+XK2S*0.00441787012D0))))
02405       ELE=1.D0+XK2S*(0.44325141463D0+XK2S*(0.0626060122D0+XK2S*
02406      *      (0.04757383546D0+XK2S*0.01736506451D0))) +DL*
02407      *     XK2S*(0.2499836831D0+XK2S*(0.09200180037D0+XK2S*
02408      *       (0.04069697526D0+XK2S*0.00526449639D0)))
02409 C
02410       APHI2=((1.D0-XK2*0.5D0)*ELK-ELE)/XKRHO12
02411 
02412       APPRC=A1*APHI1+A2*APHI2
02413       IF (PROX) APPRC=APPRC*SINT/SINT1   !   LINEAR INTERPOLATION, IF TOO CLOSE TO THE Z-AXIS
02414 C
02415       RETURN
02416       END
02417 C
02418 C@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
02419 C
02420 C
02421          SUBROUTINE PRC_QUAD (X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02422 C
02423          IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02424 
02425          DATA D,DD/1.D-4,2.D-4/, DS/1.D-2/,DC/0.99994999875D0/
02426 
02427          RHO2=X**2+Y**2
02428          R=DSQRT(RHO2+Z**2)
02429          RHO=DSQRT(RHO2)
02430          SINT=RHO/R
02431          COST=Z/R
02432          RP=R+D
02433          RM=R-D
02434 
02435          IF (SINT.GT.DS) THEN
02436            CPHI=X/RHO
02437            SPHI=Y/RHO
02438            BR=BR_PRC_Q(R,SINT,COST)
02439            BT=BT_PRC_Q(R,SINT,COST)
02440            DBRR=(BR_PRC_Q(RP,SINT,COST)-BR_PRC_Q(RM,SINT,COST))/DD
02441            THETA=DATAN2(SINT,COST)
02442            TP=THETA+D
02443            TM=THETA-D
02444            SINTP=DSIN(TP)
02445            COSTP=DCOS(TP)
02446            SINTM=DSIN(TM)
02447            COSTM=DCOS(TM)
02448            DBTT=(BT_PRC_Q(R,SINTP,COSTP)-BT_PRC_Q(R,SINTM,COSTM))/DD
02449            BX=SINT*(BR+(BR+R*DBRR+DBTT)*SPHI**2)+COST*BT
02450            BY=-SINT*SPHI*CPHI*(BR+R*DBRR+DBTT)
02451            BZ=(BR*COST-BT*SINT)*CPHI
02452          ELSE
02453            ST=DS
02454            CT=DC
02455            IF (Z.LT.0.D0) CT=-DC
02456            THETA=DATAN2(ST,CT)
02457            TP=THETA+D
02458            TM=THETA-D
02459            SINTP=DSIN(TP)
02460            COSTP=DCOS(TP)
02461            SINTM=DSIN(TM)
02462            COSTM=DCOS(TM)
02463            BR=BR_PRC_Q(R,ST,CT)
02464            BT=BT_PRC_Q(R,ST,CT)
02465            DBRR=(BR_PRC_Q(RP,ST,CT)-BR_PRC_Q(RM,ST,CT))/DD
02466            DBTT=(BT_PRC_Q(R,SINTP,COSTP)-BT_PRC_Q(R,SINTM,COSTM))/DD
02467            FCXY=R*DBRR+DBTT
02468            BX=(BR*(X**2+2.D0*Y**2)+FCXY*Y**2)/(R*ST)**2+BT*COST
02469            BY=-(BR+FCXY)*X*Y/(R*ST)**2
02470            BZ=(BR*COST/ST-BT)*X/R
02471          ENDIF
02472 
02473          RETURN
02474          END
02475 c
02476 c&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
02477 C
02478       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION BR_PRC_Q (R,SINT,COST)
02479 C
02480 Calculates the radial component of the "quadrupole" part of the model partial ring current.
02481 C
02482       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02483 
02484       DATA A1,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9,A10,A11,A12,A13,A14,A15,A16,A17,   ! ALL LINEAR PARAMETERS HERE
02485      * A18,XK1,AL1,DAL1,B1,BE1,XK2,AL2,DAL2,B2,BE2,XK3,XK4,AL3,DAL3,B3,  ! WERE MULTIPLIED BY 0.1,
02486      * BE3,AL4,DAL4,DG1,AL5,DAL5,DG2,C1,C2,C3,AL6,DAL6,DRM
02487      * /-21.2666329D0, 32.24527521D0,-6.062894078D0,7.515660734D0,  ! SO THAT THEY CORRESPOND TO P_0=1 nPa
02488      * 233.7341288D0,-227.1195714D0, 8.483233889D0,16.80642754D0,   ! RATHER THAN THE ORIGINAL VALUE OF 10 nPa
02489      * -24.63534184D0,9.067120578D0,-1.052686913D0, -12.08384538D0, ! ASSUMED IN THE BIOT-SAVART INTEGRAL
02490      * 18.61969572D0,-12.71686069D0,47017.35679D0,-50646.71204D0, 
02491      * 7746.058231D0,1.531069371D0,2.318824273D0,.1417519429D0,
02492      * .6388013110D-02, 5.303934488D0,4.213397467D0,.7955534018D0,
02493      * .1401142771D0,.2306094179D-01, 3.462235072D0,2.568743010D0,
02494      * 3.477425908D0,1.922155110D0,.1485233485D0, .2319676273D-01,
02495      * 7.830223587D0,8.492933868D0,.1295221828D0,.01753008801D0, 
02496      * .01125504083D0,.1811846095D0,.04841237481D0,.01981805097D0,
02497      * 6.557801891D0, 6.348576071D0,5.744436687D0,.2265212965D0,
02498      * .1301957209D0,.5654023158D0/
02499 
02500         SINT2=SINT**2
02501         COST2=COST**2
02502         SC=SINT*COST
02503         ALPHA=SINT2/R
02504         GAMMA=COST/R**2
02505 
02506         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL1,DAL1,F,FA,FS)
02507         D1=SC*F**XK1/((R/B1)**BE1+1.D0)
02508         D2=D1*COST2
02509 
02510         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL2,DAL2,F,FA,FS)
02511         D3=SC*FS**XK2/((R/B2)**BE2+1.D0)
02512         D4=D3*COST2
02513 
02514         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL3,DAL3,F,FA,FS)
02515         D5=SC*(ALPHA**XK3)*(FS**XK4)/((R/B3)**BE3+1.D0)
02516         D6=D5*COST2
02517 
02518         ARGA=((ALPHA-AL4)/DAL4)**2+1.D0
02519         ARGG=1.D0+(GAMMA/DG1)**2
02520 
02521         D7=SC/ARGA/ARGG
02522         D8=D7/ARGA
02523         D9=D8/ARGA
02524         D10=D9/ARGA
02525 
02526         ARGA=((ALPHA-AL5)/DAL5)**2+1.D0
02527         ARGG=1.D0+(GAMMA/DG2)**2
02528 
02529         D11=SC/ARGA/ARGG
02530         D12=D11/ARGA
02531         D13=D12/ARGA
02532         D14=D13/ARGA
02533 
02534 
02535         D15=SC/(R**4+C1**4)
02536         D16=SC/(R**4+C2**4)*COST2
02537         D17=SC/(R**4+C3**4)*COST2**2
02538 
02539         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL6,DAL6,F,FA,FS)
02540         D18=SC*FS/(1.D0+((R-1.2D0)/DRM)**2)
02541 
02542         BR_PRC_Q=A1*D1+A2*D2+A3*D3+A4*D4+A5*D5+A6*D6+A7*D7+A8*D8+A9*D9+
02543      *  A10*D10+A11*D11+A12*D12+A13*D13+A14*D14+A15*D15+A16*D16+A17*D17+
02544      *   A18*D18
02545 
02546 C
02547         RETURN
02548         END
02549 c
02550 C%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
02551 C
02552         DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION BT_PRC_Q (R,SINT,COST)
02553 C
02554 Calculates the Theta component of the "quadrupole" part of the model partial ring current.
02555 C
02556         IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02557 
02558       DATA A1,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9,A10,A11,A12,A13,A14,A15,A16,A17,  ! ALL LINEAR PARAMETERS HERE
02559      *XK1,AL1,DAL1,B1,BE1,XK2,AL2,DAL2,BE2,XK3,XK4,AL3,DAL3,B3,BE3,AL4, ! WERE MULTIPLIED BY 0.1,
02560      *DAL4,DG1,AL5,DAL5,DG2,C1,C2,C3/12.74640393D0,-7.516393516D0,  ! SO THAT THEY CORRESPOND TO P_0=1 nPa,
02561      *-5.476233865D0,3.212704645D0,-59.10926169D0,46.62198189D0,    ! RATHER THAN THE ORIGINAL VALUE OF 10 nPa
02562      *-.01644280062D0, .1234229112D0,-.08579198697D0,.01321366966D0,    ! ASSUMED IN THE BIOT-SAVART INTEGRAL
02563      *.8970494003D0,9.136186247D0, -38.19301215D0,21.73775846D0,
02564      *-410.0783424D0,-69.90832690D0,-848.8543440D0, 1.243288286D0,
02565      *.2071721360D0,.05030555417D0,7.471332374D0,3.180533613D0, 
02566      *1.376743507D0,.1568504222D0,.02092910682D0,1.985148197D0,
02567      *.3157139940D0, 1.056309517D0,.1701395257D0,.1019870070D0,
02568      *6.293740981D0,5.671824276D0, .1280772299D0,.02189060799D0,
02569      *.01040696080D0,.1648265607D0,.04701592613D0, .01526400086D0,
02570      *12.88384229D0,3.361775101D0,23.44173897D0/
02571 
02572         SINT2=SINT**2
02573         COST2=COST**2
02574         SC=SINT*COST
02575         ALPHA=SINT2/R
02576         GAMMA=COST/R**2
02577 
02578         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL1,DAL1,F,FA,FS)
02579         D1=F**XK1/((R/B1)**BE1+1.D0)
02580         D2=D1*COST2
02581 
02582         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL2,DAL2,F,FA,FS)
02583         D3=FA**XK2/R**BE2
02584         D4=D3*COST2
02585 
02586         CALL FFS(ALPHA,AL3,DAL3,F,FA,FS)
02587         D5=FS**XK3*ALPHA**XK4/((R/B3)**BE3+1.D0)
02588         D6=D5*COST2
02589 
02590         CALL FFS(GAMMA,0.D0,DG1,F,FA,FS)
02591         FCC=(1.D0+((ALPHA-AL4)/DAL4)**2)
02592         D7 =1.D0/FCC*FS
02593         D8 =D7/FCC
02594         D9 =D8/FCC
02595         D10=D9/FCC
02596 
02597         ARG=1.D0+((ALPHA-AL5)/DAL5)**2
02598         D11=1.D0/ARG/(1.D0+(GAMMA/DG2)**2)
02599         D12=D11/ARG
02600         D13=D12/ARG
02601         D14=D13/ARG
02602 
02603         D15=1.D0/(R**4+C1**2)
02604         D16=COST2/(R**4+C2**2)
02605         D17=COST2**2/(R**4+C3**2)
02606 C
02607         BT_PRC_Q=A1*D1+A2*D2+A3*D3+A4*D4+A5*D5+A6*D6+A7*D7+A8*D8+A9*D9+
02608      *   A10*D10+A11*D11+A12*D12+A13*D13+A14*D14+A15*D15+A16*D16+A17*D17
02609 C
02610        RETURN
02611        END
02612 c
02613 c@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
02614 
02615        SUBROUTINE FFS(A,A0,DA,F,FA,FS)
02616        IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02617        SQ1=DSQRT((A+A0)**2+DA**2)
02618        SQ2=DSQRT((A-A0)**2+DA**2)
02619        FA=2.D0/(SQ1+SQ2)
02620        F=FA*A
02621        FS=0.5D0*(SQ1+SQ2)/(SQ1*SQ2)*(1.D0-F*F)
02622        RETURN
02623        END
02624 C
02625 C||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
02626 C
02627 C-------------------------------------------------------------------------
02628 C
02629 C
02630          SUBROUTINE RC_SHIELD (A,PS,X_SC,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02631 C
02632        IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02633          DIMENSION A(86)
02634 C
02635          FAC_SC=(X_SC+1.D0)**3
02636 C
02637          CPS=DCOS(PS)
02638          SPS=DSIN(PS)
02639 
02640          S3PS=2.D0*CPS
02641 C
02642          PST1=PS*A(85)
02643          PST2=PS*A(86)
02644 
02645          ST1=DSIN(PST1)
02646          CT1=DCOS(PST1)
02647          ST2=DSIN(PST2)
02648          CT2=DCOS(PST2)
02649 
02650          X1=X*CT1-Z*ST1
02651          Z1=X*ST1+Z*CT1
02652          X2=X*CT2-Z*ST2
02653          Z2=X*ST2+Z*CT2
02654 C
02655          L=0
02656          GX=0.D0
02657          GY=0.D0
02658          GZ=0.D0
02659 C
02660          DO 1 M=1,2     !    M=1 IS FOR THE 1ST SUM ("PERP." SYMMETRY)
02661 C                          AND M=2 IS FOR THE SECOND SUM ("PARALL." SYMMETRY)
02662              DO 2 I=1,3
02663                   P=A(72+I)
02664                   Q=A(78+I)
02665                   CYPI=DCOS(Y/P)
02666                   CYQI=DCOS(Y/Q)
02667                   SYPI=DSIN(Y/P)
02668                   SYQI=DSIN(Y/Q)
02669 C
02670                 DO 3 K=1,3
02671                    R=A(75+K)
02672                    S=A(81+K)
02673                    SZRK=DSIN(Z1/R)
02674                    CZSK=DCOS(Z2/S)
02675                    CZRK=DCOS(Z1/R)
02676                    SZSK=DSIN(Z2/S)
02677                      SQPR=DSQRT(1.D0/P**2+1.D0/R**2)
02678                      SQQS=DSQRT(1.D0/Q**2+1.D0/S**2)
02679                         EPR=DEXP(X1*SQPR)
02680                         EQS=DEXP(X2*SQQS)
02681 C
02682                   DO 4 N=1,2  ! N=1 IS FOR THE FIRST PART OF EACH COEFFICIENT
02683 C                                AND N=2 IS FOR THE SECOND ONE
02684 
02685                     DO 5 NN=1,2 !   NN = 1,2 FURTHER SPLITS THE COEFFICIENTS INTO 2 PARTS,
02686 C                                         TO TAKE INTO ACCOUNT THE SCALE FACTOR DEPENDENCE
02687 
02688                     IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
02689                          FX=-SQPR*EPR*CYPI*SZRK  *FAC_SC
02690                          FY=EPR*SYPI*SZRK/P   *FAC_SC
02691                          FZ=-EPR*CYPI*CZRK/R  *FAC_SC
02692                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02693                          IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
02694                           HX=FX
02695                           HY=FY
02696                           HZ=FZ
02697                          ELSE
02698                           HX=FX*X_SC
02699                           HY=FY*X_SC
02700                           HZ=FZ*X_SC
02701                          ENDIF
02702                        ELSE
02703                          IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
02704                           HX=FX*CPS
02705                           HY=FY*CPS
02706                           HZ=FZ*CPS
02707                          ELSE
02708                           HX=FX*CPS*X_SC
02709                           HY=FY*CPS*X_SC
02710                           HZ=FZ*CPS*X_SC
02711                          ENDIF
02712                        ENDIF
02713 
02714                      ELSE                            !   M.EQ.2
02715                          FX=-SPS*SQQS*EQS*CYQI*CZSK  *FAC_SC
02716                          FY=SPS/Q*EQS*SYQI*CZSK   *FAC_SC
02717                          FZ=SPS/S*EQS*CYQI*SZSK   *FAC_SC
02718                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02719                         IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
02720                           HX=FX
02721                           HY=FY
02722                           HZ=FZ
02723                         ELSE
02724                           HX=FX*X_SC
02725                           HY=FY*X_SC
02726                           HZ=FZ*X_SC
02727                         ENDIF
02728                        ELSE
02729                         IF (NN.EQ.1) THEN
02730                          HX=FX*S3PS
02731                          HY=FY*S3PS
02732                          HZ=FZ*S3PS
02733                         ELSE
02734                          HX=FX*S3PS*X_SC
02735                          HY=FY*S3PS*X_SC
02736                          HZ=FZ*S3PS*X_SC
02737                         ENDIF
02738                        ENDIF
02739                   ENDIF
02740        L=L+1
02741 
02742        IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
02743        HXR=HX*CT1+HZ*ST1
02744        HZR=-HX*ST1+HZ*CT1
02745        ELSE
02746        HXR=HX*CT2+HZ*ST2
02747        HZR=-HX*ST2+HZ*CT2
02748        ENDIF
02749 
02750        GX=GX+HXR*A(L)
02751        GY=GY+HY *A(L)
02752   5    GZ=GZ+HZR*A(L)
02753 
02754   4   CONTINUE
02755   3   CONTINUE
02756   2   CONTINUE
02757   1   CONTINUE
02758 
02759       BX=GX
02760       BY=GY
02761       BZ=GZ
02762 
02763       RETURN
02764       END
02765 C
02766 c===========================================================================
02767 c
02768        SUBROUTINE DIPOLE (PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02769 C
02770 C      A DOUBLE PRECISION ROUTINE
02771 C
02772 C  CALCULATES GSM COMPONENTS OF A GEODIPOLE FIELD WITH THE DIPOLE MOMENT
02773 C  CORRESPONDING TO THE EPOCH OF 2000.
02774 C
02775 C----INPUT PARAMETERS:
02776 C     PS - GEODIPOLE TILT ANGLE IN RADIANS,
02777 C     X,Y,Z - GSM COORDINATES IN RE (1 RE = 6371.2 km)
02778 C
02779 C----OUTPUT PARAMETERS:
02780 C     BX,BY,BZ - FIELD COMPONENTS IN GSM SYSTEM, IN NANOTESLA.
02781 C
02782       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02783       SPS=DSIN(PS)
02784       CPS=DCOS(PS)
02785       P=X**2
02786       U=Z**2
02787       V=3.D0*Z*X
02788       T=Y**2
02789       Q=30115.D0/DSQRT(P+T+U)**5
02790       BX=Q*((T+U-2.D0*P)*SPS-V*CPS)
02791       BY=-3.D0*Y*Q*(X*SPS+Z*CPS)
02792       BZ=Q*((P+T-2.D0*U)*CPS-V*SPS)
02793       RETURN
02794       END
02795 
02796 
02797 
02798 C
02799 C(((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((
